Title: Arboreal Phalanges
Game Text: When this card is destroyed, Akash'Bhuta deals herself 14 fixed energy damage. END PHASE This card deals the non-Villain target with the highest HP (H) melee damage.
Flavor Text: Stick with it! Surely we can't be defeated by an assortment of shrubberies!

Title: Disrupt the Field
Game Text: Destroy all Environment cards. Play the top card of the Environment deck. Play the top card of the Villain deck.
Flavor Text: We must stop this fiend and save Megalopolis... before it's too late!

Title: Earth's Sacrifice
Game Text: Destroy (H) minus 1 Hero Ongoing cards. Discard as many cards from the top of the Environment deck as cards destroyed by this card.
Flavor Text: You may drain my strength, but you cannot crush my will.
Attribution: The Argent Adept, Virtuoso of the Void #152

Title: Ensnaring Brambles
Game Text: When this card is destroyed, Akash'Bhuta deals herself 8 fixed energy damage. END PHASE Select the Hero target with the lowest HP. -2 damage dealt by that target until the Villain START PHASE.
Flavor Text: Rah! This is no longer fun! Haka, Prime Wardens Vol. 1 #2 3 Core Game

Title: Entropic Fungi
Game Text: When this card is destroyed, Akash'Bhuta deals herself 6 fixed energy damage. END PHASE This card deals each target in the Hero play area with the most cards in play 2 toxic damage. Destroy 1 Ongoing card and 1 Item card in that play area. We just got new gear, but it's already acting like it spent the last decade in the mud. Doc's gonna be mad.
Flavor Text: Absolute Zero, Freedom Five Annual #10

Title: Harsh Renewal
Game Text: START PHASE Destroy the Primeval Limb card in play with the lowest HP, preventing any damage Akash'Bhuta would deal herself. Shuffle the Villain trash into the Villain deck. Discover (H) minus 2 Primeval Limb cards.
Flavor Text: You cannot outrun time. I have been a part of this planet since before your ancestors learned of fire, and I shall remain here after you are long gone.

Title: Interposing Stalagmites
Game Text: -1 damage dealt to Akash'Bhuta. When this card is destroyed, Akash'Bhuta deals herself 12 fixed energy damage. END PHASE This card deals the non-Villain target with the lowest HP 2 melee damage.
Flavor Text: Like rain on the mountain or wind through a forest, you are barely noticed. Cease your struggles. Leave this world.

Title: Living Rockslide
Game Text: When this card is destroyed, Akash'Bhuta deals herself 10 fixed energy damage. END PHASE This card deals each non-Villain target 2 projectile damage.
Flavor Text: Who is that? We gotta get him out of there!

Title: Primeval Eruption
Game Text: Discover (H) minus 1 Primeval Limb cards. Discard the top (H) plus 1 cards of the Environment deck.
Flavor Text: This is it... the beginning of the end.
Attribution: The Argent Adept, Mother Earth One-Shot

Title: Return to the Earth
Game Text: Destroy (H) minus 1 Item cards. Restore all Environment targets and Primeval Limb cards to their max HP.
Flavor Text: From the earth it was born, and so to the earth it shall return!

Title: Auto Stims
Game Text: END PHASE Ambuscade regains (H) HP. Reveal the top card of the Villain deck. If it is a One-Shot card, play it. Otherwise, discard it.
Flavor Text: Take your time, son. We've got a long way to go, and neither one of us is leaving this place on the horse we rode in on.

Title: Hunter Drone
Game Text: If Ambuscade is immune to damage, damage dealt by this card is irreducible. END PHASE This card deals the Hero target with the highest HP (H) minus 1 energy damage. Until the Villain START PHASE, -1 damage dealt by the target dealt damage this way.
Flavor Text: I spotted that drone again a few klicks back. Looks like we didn't shake Ambuscade after all.

Title: Primed Tranq Dart
Game Text: If this card is played during a Hero turn, Ambuscade deals that Hero character (H) minus 2 toxic damage. Otherwise, Ambuscade deals each Hero target 2 toxic damage and each Hero destroys 1 Ongoing card in their play area.
Flavor Text: Ughh, I knew that you'd... betray me eventually. Which is why I... put a bomb in your car.

Title: Quelle Surprise!
Game Text: If this card is played during a Hero turn, Ambuscade deals that Hero character (H) minus 1 projectile damage. Otherwise, Ambuscade deals the Hero target with the highest HP (H) plus 1 irreducible melee damage.
Flavor Text: Come out, come out... Today, preferably.

Title: Reactive Plating
Game Text: -1 damage dealt to this card and to Ambuscade. After Ambuscade or this card is dealt damage by a non-Villain target, this card deals the attacker (H) minus 1 energy damage.
Flavor Text: Pffft, amateurs. Do they really call you heroes?

Title: Rigged to Detonate
Game Text: If this card is played during a Hero turn, Ambuscade deals that Hero character (H) minus 2 fire damage. Otherwise, Ambuscade deals each Hero target 2 fire damage and each Hero destroys 1 Item card in their play area.
Flavor Text: He's already been here -- don't trust anything.

Title: Run and Gun
Game Text: When this card is destroyed, [flip] Ambuscade's character card. START PHASE Shuffle the Villain trash into the Villain deck. Then, destroy this card. END PHASE Ambuscade deals the Hero target with the highest HP (H) minus 1 projectile damage.
Flavor Text: Bonjour, Monsieur Haka! You are lucky enough to be the most valuable prey to moi, the one and only Ambuscade!

Title: Snatch and Grab
Game Text: When this card is destroyed, [flip] Ambuscade's character card. START PHASE The Hero with the most cards in hand discards 2 cards. Then, destroy this card. END PHASE Ambuscade deals the Hero target with the second lowest HP (H) minus 1 melee damage.
Flavor Text: Something's not right here. It's almost like I'm being hunted... in my city? Someone's feeling confident.

Title: Spray and Pray
Game Text: When this card is destroyed, [flip] Ambuscade's character card. START PHASE Ambuscade regains (H) HP. Then, destroy this card. END PHASE Ambuscade deals each Hero target 2 projectile damage.
Flavor Text: A glorious fight! Someone should look into the movie rights for this encounter!
Attribution: Ambuscade, Ra: God of the Sun #263

Title: Steal the Spotlight
Game Text: If this card is played during a Hero turn, Ambuscade regains (H) HP, deals the Hero target with the highest HP (H) projectile damage, and discovers 1 Device card. Otherwise, Ambuscade deals the (H) minus 1 Hero targets with the highest HP 2 projectile damage.
Flavor Text: Oh hon hon! It is I, the amazing Ambuscade! Did you know, I do all my own stunts?

Title: Unavoidable Explosive
Game Text: If this card is played during a Hero turn, Ambuscade deals that Hero character (H) minus 2 energy damage. Otherwise, Ambuscade deals each Hero target 3 energy damage.
Flavor Text: What cannot be seen cannot be avoided.

Title: Blood Magic's Boon
Game Text: Whenever a Werewolf card would deal melee damage, change the damage type to infernal and make it irreducible. START PHASE The Werewolf card with the highest HP deals itself 2 infernal damage. Then, if that Werewolf card is not Apex, play the top card of the Villain deck.
Flavor Text: I smell the blood in the air. This ritual-- we cannot allow it to continue!

Title: Chel
Game Text: -1 damage dealt to this card by targets with fewer HP than this card. END PHASE This card deals each non-Villain target 2 infernal damage.
Flavor Text: We are supernatural creatures, above and beyond by our very existence. Why should we not reach for more?

Title: Feral Pack
Game Text: Each Werewolf card deals a different non-Villain target 2 melee damage.
Flavor Text: They're in a complete blood-frenzy! Gather up anyone you can and get far, far away from here!

Title: Flint
Game Text: -1 damage dealt to this card by targets with fewer HP than this card. END PHASE This card deals the non-Villain target with the highest HP 4 melee damage.
Flavor Text: We're gonna fight. [GROWL] You're gonna die.

Title: Gumbo
Game Text: -1 damage dealt to this card by targets with fewer HP than this card. END PHASE This card deals the non-Villain target with the highest HP 3 melee damage. Then, this card deals the target with the highest HP 3 melee damage.
Flavor Text: Oh ha-hah! Hee hee hee! I know de best joke... and you de punchline! Gumbo, Alpha: The Wolf-Woman #20 1 Rook City Renegades

Title: Hunting Party
Game Text: Shuffle the Villain trash into the Villain deck. Discover 1 Werewolf card and 1 Ongoing card.
Flavor Text: For all their might and terror, their most frightening aspect may be their ability to move so quietly for something so large.

Title: Magistra Damaris
Game Text: +1 radiant damage dealt to this card. After a Werewolf card is destroyed, each Villain target regains (H) HP. END PHASE This card deals each non-Vampire target 1 irreducible infernal damage.
Flavor Text: Those who seek power eventually find themselves at the Court of Blood. Like those who came before, you will be made to heel.

Title: Making of an Alpha
Game Text: The 2 non-Villain targets with the highest HP deal each other 3 melee damage each. Then, if either of those targets have fewer HP than Apex, play the top card of the Villain deck.
Flavor Text: I do not want to fight you, but it seems choice has been taken from us. Do not go easy on me!
Attribution: Haka, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 3 #91

Title: Moonless Night
Game Text: -2 damage dealt to and by Werewolf cards. START PHASE Apex regains (H) HP. Destroy this card. END PHASE Shuffle the Villain trash into the Villain deck. Discover (H) minus 2 Werewolf cards.
Flavor Text: They act as though they are far greater than humanity, when truly, they exist as a corruption. You, however, are something different.

Title: No Shortage of Wolves
Game Text: START PHASE If there are (H) or fewer Werewolf cards in play, shuffle the Villain trash into the Villain deck and discover 1 Werewolf card. END PHASE The Werewolf card with the highest HP deals the (H) minus 1 Hero targets with the highest HP 1 melee damage each.
Flavor Text: If we run, the pack will hunt us, and we will die. If we stand and fight... we might live.

Title: On the Blood Trail
Game Text: Discover 1 Werewolf card. The Werewolf card with the highest HP deals the Hero target with the lowest HP 3 melee damage.
Flavor Text: Run, little morsel. We have your scent now -- there's nowhere for you to hide.

Title: The Pack Hungers
Game Text: +1 damage dealt by Werewolf cards. START PHASE Apex regains (H) HP. Destroy 1 Werewolf card with 3 or fewer HP. Destroy this card. END PHASE Each Werewolf card deals itself 1 toxic damage.
Flavor Text: Stick together and don't let them get behind you. If they can separate us, they'll tear us apart!

Title: Rowan
Game Text: -1 damage dealt to this card by targets with fewer HP than this card. END PHASE This card deals the non-Villain target with the lowest HP 3 melee damage.
Flavor Text: I can't wait to taste your blood... Let the hunt begin!

Title: Timber
Game Text: -1 damage dealt to this card by targets with fewer HP than this card. END PHASE This card deals the (H) minus 2 non-Villain targets with the highest HP 3 melee damage each.
Flavor Text: Werewolves have existed in the shadows for centuries. No longer. Our time is now.

Title: A Wolf Among Sheep
Game Text: Apex deals each non-Villain target 2 melee damage. Whenever a target is destroyed by this damage, Apex regains (H) HP.
Flavor Text: Look how easily they bleed and die! You would choose this over the life of an apex predator?!

Title: Condemnation
Game Text: After damage dealt by Apostate destroys a target, Apostate regains 6 HP.  END PHASE: Apostate deals the non-Villain target with the lowest HP 3 melee damage. This card and Apostate both regain 3 HP.
Flavor Text: This blade has heard the cries of a thousand souls, and still thirsts for a thousand more.

Title: Corrupted Effigy
Game Text: -1 damage dealt to Demon cards.  END PHASE: If there are fewer than (H) Demon cards in play, discover 1 Demon card.
Flavor Text: These things you hold sacred are the worst of falsehoods!

Title: Fiendish Pugilist
Game Text: END PHASE: This card deals the Hero target with the highest HP (H) minus 1 melee damage.
Flavor Text: Most demons are general purpose -- a bit of torment, scary shapes in the dark, your occasional deal. Me, I'm something of a specialist.

Title: Gauntlet of Perdition
Game Text: +1 damage dealt by Apostate.  END PHASE: Apostate deals the (H) minus 1 Hero targets with the lowest HP 1 melee damage each.
Flavor Text: He wields a dark force, drinking of my spirit as he strikes.
Attribution: Mr. Fixer, Dark Watch Annual Vol. 1 #4

Title: Imp Pilferer
Game Text: END PHASE: Destroy 1 Hero Ongoing or Item card. This card deals the Hero target with the second lowest HP (H) minus 2 infernal damage.
Flavor Text: I'll get the right one this time, oh great lord of lies and hair care products! I won't disappoint you again!
Attribution: Nahropt, Ra: God of the Sun Vol. 1 #306

Title: Orb of Delirium
Game Text: +1 damage dealt by Environment targets to Hero targets.  END PHASE: Each Hero discards up to 2 cards. If fewer than (H) cards are discarded this way, each Hero character deals themself 3 fixed psychic damaeg.
Flavor Text: You could destroy it. But then, you would never know how it worked. Wouldn't you rather study it, and learn of its power?
Attribution: GloomWeaver, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 4 #77

Title: Periapt of Woe
Game Text: -1 damage deal to Relic cards.  END PHASE: Apostate regains (H) HP.
Flavor Text: Your toys and baubles cannot save you, vile betrayer! Bring forth your lies -- your smiting is still at hand!

Title: Relic Spirit
Game Text: END PHASE: The Relic card with the lowest HP regains (H) HP. Then, reveal the top card of the Villain deck. If it is a Relic card, play it. Otherwise, discard it.
Flavor Text: The tomes tell of such bound entities, but I had not thought to encounter one.

Title: Runes of Malediction
Game Text: -1 damage dealt to Apostate.  END PHASE: Destroy 1 Hero Ongoing card from 1 Hero play area with a Lie card. If no card is destroyed this way, Apostate deals the Hero target with the lowest HP (H) minus 1 infernal damage.
Flavor Text: This is not of the Void, nor of cosmic origins. Oh, by the scales, has he crafted this of himself?!
Attribution: The Argent Adept, Virtuoso of the Void Vol. 2 #21

Title: Tome of the Unknowable
Game Text: -1 to Hero target HP recovery.  END PHASE: The Hero target with the highest HP deals itself X fixed psychic damage, where X is the number of Ongoing cards in their play area plus 1.
Flavor Text: The words within -- if words they be -- seek to exhaust my very will. But I must keep reading!
Attribution: The Scholar, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 2 #346

Title: You Will Bring Pain
Game Text: If there are ever no active Heroes in this play area, bury this card.  END PHASE: A Hero character in this play area deals 2 other non-Villain targets 1 energy damage each. If no damage is dealt this way, put this card under the Villain character card.
Flavor Text: I'm being as careful as I can, but you ***know*** that I'll always protect you and the rest of the team. …Right? …Amanda?

Title: You're Not Who You Think You Are
Game Text: If there are ever no active Heroes in this play area, bury this card.  END PHASE: Discard 1 card from your hand. Discard the top card of your deck. If there are at least 3 different keywords on cards discarded this way, put this card under the Villain character card.
Flavor Text: A divine being? We both know the truth. Isn't it more likely that you're just like me?

Title: You're Unworthy
Game Text: If there are ever no active Heroes in this play area, bury this card.  END PHASE: Bury 1 card from your hand. Each ally Hero may draw 1 card. Then, if you have more cards in hand than each other Hero, put this card under the Villain character card.
Flavor Text: I'm sure it's fine! They all like having you around, probably. Who doesn't like a plucky little intern or sidekick?

Title: Your Allies Betray You
Game Text: If there are ever no active Heroes in this play area, bury this card.  END PHASE: Discard the top card of 2 Hero decks. If any One-Shot cards are discarded this way, 1 Hero character in this play area deals themself 2 psychic damage. If no damage is dealt this way, put this card under the Villain character card.
Flavor Text: Of course the messages from Cuba are of no concern, Presidente. Unless… Do you think they are after our gold?

Title: Your Secrets Will Be Exposed
Game Text: If there are ever no active Heroes in this play area, bury this card.  END PHASE: Discard 1 card. If the discarded card shares any keywords with any cards in play, 1 Hero character in this play area deals themself 2 energy damage. If no damage is dealt this way, put this card under the Villain character card.
Flavor Text: With this, our deal is sealed. So long as you provide us with your blood, the Court of Blood swears to cease our hunting of humanity.
Attribution: Blood Countess, The Savage Haka Vol. 1 #166

Title: Your World Is a Lie
Game Text: If there are ever no active Heroes in this play area, bury this card.  END PHASE: Discard 1 card from hand. Discard the top card of your deck. If the discarded cards share at least 1 keyword, put this card under the Villain character card.
Flavor Text: You believe so ***blindly*** that your faith imbued your foe with power. As usual, you were only ever fighting yourself.

Title: Backlash Field Generator
Game Text: After any Villain target other than this card is dealt damage by a Hero target, this card deals the attacker 2 lightning damage.
Flavor Text: He's surrounded by a phase-shifted nanowave field, powered by that lithium microfilament capacitor on his belt!

Title: Blade Battalion
Game Text: END PHASE This card deals the Hero target with the highest HP X melee damage, where X is the current HP of this card.
Flavor Text: Glorious Mordengrad! Our arms and minds are yours! Glorious Mordengrad! You grant us strength and life!

Title: Consider the Price of Victory!
Game Text: -1 damage dealt by Hero targets. START PHASE Each Hero discards 1 card. Baron Blade deals each Hero target 1 sonic damage. Discard the top (H) minus 1 cards of the villain deck. Destroy this card.
Flavor Text: Before this day is ended, the entire planet shall grovel helplessly at my feet!

Title: Devious Disruption
Game Text: Each Hero may destroy any of their Ongoing and/or Item cards. Baron Blade deals each Hero character X lightning damage, where X is the number of Hero Ongoing and Item cards in that Hero's play area plus 3.
Flavor Text: The agony and shame of your defeat shall break you!

Title: Hasten Doom
Game Text: Baron Blade deals each Hero target 2 toxic damage. Play the top card of the Villain deck.
Flavor Text: I have specifically designed this formula to counteract the strength of your genetics and strip you of the very evolutionary leaps that make you unique!

Title: Jet-Jump Battalion
Game Text: After this card is played, reveal the top card of the Villain deck. If that card is a Device card, play it. Otherwise, discard it. END PHASE This card deals the (H) minus 2 Hero targets with the highest HP 2 energy damage each.
Flavor Text: You fight in service of Baron Blade and for the glory of Mordengrad!

Title: Living Force-Field
Game Text: -1 damage dealt to Baron Blade. END PHASE Baron Blade regains (H) minus 1 HP.
Flavor Text: I am barely amused by your worthless attempts at competence.

Title: Mobile Defense Platform
Game Text: Baron Blade is immune to damage. END PHASE Reveal the top card of the Villain deck. If it is a Minion card, play it. Otherwise, discard it.
Flavor Text: Until we take that blasted floating fortress out, Blade is practically untouchable!

Title: Powered Turret
Game Text: +1 damage dealt by this card for each other Device card in play. END PHASE This card deals each Hero target 1 energy damage.
Flavor Text: Arming this platform has been one of my best decisions. It's the little things, really.

Title: Remote Walking Tank
Game Text: -1 damage dealt to this card. END PHASE This card deals the Hero target with the highest HP (H) energy damage.
Flavor Text: My father was truly a visionary. A brilliant inventor with ideas far beyond his time. His loss will be repaid in blood!

Title: Blinding Blast
Game Text: Citizen Dawn deals each Hero target 2 energy damage. Each Hero discards 1 card.
Flavor Text: I'm not less of a person just because I don't have powers like you. But you're less of a person for being such a terrible mother.

Title: Channel the Eclipse
Game Text: START PHASE Play the top card of the Villain deck. END PHASE Citizen Dawn deals each non-Villain target 2 energy damage.
Flavor Text: The eclipse is about to happen! Should disrupt Dawn's powers. That is, unless it all goes bonkers and she gets more dangerous. Seems unlikely.

Title: Citizen Anvil
Game Text: -1 damage dealt to Citizen cards. END PHASE If Citizen Hammer is in the Villain trash, move him into play.
Flavor Text: Halt.

Title: Citizen Assault
Game Text: If Citizen Battery is in play, +1 damage dealt by Citizen Assault. END PHASE This card deals each Hero target 1 melee damage.
Flavor Text: Don't get too close to me. It's not that I don't like the company. It's that I can't be trusted.

Title: Citizen Autumn
Game Text: START PHASE Citizens Winter, Spring, and Summer each destroy 1 Environment card. END PHASE Destroy all Ongoing cards controlled by the Hero with the lowest HP.
Flavor Text: As autumn leaves must dying fade, your futile acts shall be unmade.

Title: Citizen Battery
Game Text: If Citizen Assault is in play, +2 damage dealt by Citizen Battery. END PHASE This card deals the Hero target with the highest HP 3 energy damage.
Flavor Text: I fight for honor. There is honor in victory. I will do anything to attain victory.

Title: Citizen Blood
Game Text: END PHASE This card deals the Hero target with the lowest HP 1 infernal damage. If Citizen Sweat is in play, this card regains 4 HP. If Citizen Tears is in play, 1 Hero discards 1 card.
Flavor Text: Would you care to cavort with a coven of corpses in the pale moonlight?

Title: Citizen Dare
Game Text: +1 damage dealt to Hero targets. After Citizen Truth is played, this card deals each Hero target 1 irreducible psychic damage. Then bury this card.
Flavor Text: I'm listening, but I'm also thinking about killing you.

Title: Citizen Hammer
Game Text: If Citizen Anvil is in play, -1 damage dealt to this card. END PHASE This card deals each Hero target 3 fire damage.
Flavor Text: Seems like everything's on fire... that was probably me. Well, you know what they say: burn what you love!

Title: Citizen Spring
Game Text: START PHASE Citizens Summer, Autumn, and Winter each regain 2 HP. END PHASE Each Citizen card regains 1 HP.
Flavor Text: Laughter springs in wind and rain, brings healing light and healing pain.

Title: Citizen Summer
Game Text: START PHASE Citizens Autumn, Winter, and Spring each deal the Hero target with the highest HP 1 fire damage. END PHASE This card deals the 2 Heroes with the most cards in play 3 fire damage each.
Flavor Text: Summer withers hopes to fears, and dries to salt the crystal tears.

Title: Citizen Sweat
Game Text: END PHASE Destroy 1 Hero Ongoing card. If Citizen Blood is in play, destroy 1 Hero Ongoing card. Citizen Tears deals each Hero target 1 melee damage.
Flavor Text: Would you rather live in fear, or die with confidence?

Title: Citizen Tears
Game Text: END PHASE Each Hero discards 1 card. Citizen Blood deals the Hero target with the highest HP 2 infernal damage. Citizen Sweat deals the Hero target with the lowest HP 2 fire damage.
Flavor Text: I hunger for the marrow that cracks within all men.

Title: Citizen Truth
Game Text: Citizen Truth's allies are immune to damage. -1 damage dealt to Citizen Truth. After Citizen Dare is played, each Citizen card regains 2 HP. Then, bury this card.
Flavor Text: Look away from the chosen few. You're fighting me, and you can't win. You fight against truth.

Title: Citizen Winter
Game Text: START PHASE Citizens Spring, Summer, and Autumn each destroy 1 Hero Ongoing card. END PHASE This card deals each Hero target 2 cold damage.
Flavor Text: Cold the touch of winter's breath, and cold the hand that touches death.

Title: Devastating Aurora
Game Text: Destroy all Ongoing cards. Destroy all Item cards. Destroy all Environment cards. Citizen Dawn deals herself 5 cold damage.
Flavor Text: My power can be contained no longer! This world will be cleansed by my light! Nothing can stop me!

Title: Healing Light
Game Text: Citizen Dawn regains 10 HP. Restore all other Citizen cards to their maximum HP.
Flavor Text: Like the dawning sun, rise again, and bring light to this darkened world!

Title: Luminous Leadership
Game Text: +1 damage dealt by Citizen cards. START PHASE If Citizen Dawn is the only Citizen card in play, discover 1 Citizen card.
Flavor Text: The sun shines brightly this day, Citizens! We shall taste victory!

Title: Return with the Dawn
Game Text: START PHASE Play the (H) minus 2 Citizen cards with the lowest HP from the Villain trash.
Flavor Text: Yeah, yeah, you took one out. Kudos. Trophy. Don't light the sparklers just yet. She doesn't tend to let them stay down for long.

Title: Ardent Acolytes
Game Text: END PHASE This card deals the Hero target with the highest HP 3 melee damage.
Flavor Text: Some poor souls are trapped in such darkness that they will burn anything -- or anyone -- at all, just to see some light.
Attribution: The Scholar, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 4 #19

Title: Cult Leader Massey
Game Text: START PHASE Discover 1 Cultists card. END PHASE This card deals the non-Villain target with the lowest HP and the Cultists card with the lowest HP 2 infernal damage each. If a target is destroyed this way, discover 1 Relic card.
Flavor Text: Your true calling begins now, child of Gloom. Go and share the words of desolation.

Title: Deathrattle
Game Text: START PHASE Discover 1 Zombies card. END PHASE This card deals the Hero target with the lowest HP X infernal damage, where X is the number of Zombies cards in play plus 1.
Flavor Text: The gloom of death serves the master in many ways.

Title: Devoted Disciples
Game Text: END PHASE This card deals the 3 Hero targets with the highest HP 1 infernal damage each.
Flavor Text: This temple to Gloom holds too much sway over the hearts of man. Something must be done!
Attribution: Dr. Blake Washington, Jr., Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 2 #271

Title: Drum of Despair
Game Text: When this card is destroyed, each Hero target regains 3 HP. END PHASE Discover 1 Cultists card. If no cards are played this way, each Hero discards 1 card.
Flavor Text: The rhythm of suffering... It is music to my ears.

Title: Grimoire of Curses
Game Text: When this card is destroyed, each Hero draws 3 cards. END PHASE Each Hero may discard 1 card. Then, GloomWeaver deals each non-Villain target X infernal damage, where X is (H) minus the number of cards discarded this way.
Flavor Text: Now, Children of the Gloom, let us meditate on these horrors.
Attribution: Cult Leader Massey, Fabric of Despair #1

Title: Malevolent Malaise
Game Text: GloomWeaver deals each Hero target 2 psychic damage. Each Hero discards 1 card. Play the top card of the Villain deck.
Flavor Text: He can reach across the realms to choke the living!

Title: Master Xian Niu
Game Text: START PHASE Play the top card of the Villain deck. END PHASE Destroy (H) minus 2 Hero Ongoing and/or Item cards.
Flavor Text: True mastery comes with an understanding of inadequacy -- you will never be good enough. Let the despair get to you.
Attribution: Master Xian Niu, Mystery Comics Vol. 2 #509

Title: Ophidia, the Deceiver
Game Text: START PHASE Reveal the top card of the Villain deck. If it is a target card, play it. Otherwise, discard it. END PHASE The Hero character with the second lowest HP either destroys 1 of their Ongoing cards or deals themself (H) psychic damage.
Flavor Text: She slithers between this reality and the next, feeding on our very souls.

Title: Pouch of Bones
Game Text: When this card is destroyed, each Villain target deals itself 3 fixed psychic damage. END PHASE Discover 1 Zombies card. If no cards are played this way, shuffle the Villain trash into the Villain deck and GloomWeaver deals each Hero target 1 psychic damage.
Flavor Text: The dead walk again?! Blasphemy! They shall be scoured from existence!

Title: Ronwe, the Cursed
Game Text: START PHASE This card deals the (H) minus 1 Hero targets with the highest HP 3 infernal damage each. END PHASE This card deals each Hero target 1 fire damage.
Flavor Text: You shall beg for true despair! And he, the dread lord GloomWeaver, shall grant it!
Attribution: Ronwe, the Cursed, Freedom Five Annual #6

Title: Strength of the Grave
Game Text: +1 damage dealt by Zombies cards. After a Chosen or Cultists card is destroyed, discover 1 Zombies card.
Flavor Text: Let the graves of the damned be opened! The servants of Gloom grow ever stronger!

Title: Summoning Circle
Game Text: After this card is played, discover (H) minus 1 Cultists cards. START PHASE Reveal the top X cards of the Villain deck, where X is the number of Cultists cards in play. Play any Relic cards revealed this way. Discard the other revealed cards.
Flavor Text: You're using that archaic method for bringing a being from another reality into this one? How droll.
Attribution: The Visionary, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 3 #30

Title: Tear at Reality's Veil
Game Text: Discover 1 Chosen card. Destroy the non-Hero target with the lowest HP other than GloomWeaver. GloomWeaver deals each non-Villain target 3 psychic damage.
Flavor Text: His Imminence the all-powerful Lord of Gloom himself has seen fit to bless me with greater purpose!
Attribution: Ronwe, the Cursed, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 2 #338

Title: Vast Following
Game Text: Shuffle the Villain trash into the Villain deck. Discover (H) minus 1 Cultists cards.
Flavor Text: Your children hear your call, dread GloomWeaver!
Attribution: Cult Leader Massey, Fabric of Despair #4

Title: Zombie Servants
Game Text: END PHASE This card deals the Hero target with the highest HP (H) melee damage.
Flavor Text: The dead are robbed of the bliss of true gloom, but they can still bring gloom to others!

Title: Advance Soldiers
Game Text: This card is immune to projectile damage. END PHASE This card deals the Hero target with the highest HP 2 projectile damage.
Flavor Text: The Qubrin had almost unparalleled hand-eye coordination. Made for exceptional marksmen, after the culling.
Attribution: Gene-Doctor Kronz, Thorathian Gene-Binding Journal One-Shot

Title: Bionauts
Game Text: This card is immune to toxic damage. END PHASE This card deals the Hero target with the lowest HP 2 toxic damage.
Flavor Text: The Mubbloxians' naturally toxic blood provided a delightful opportunity for a new class of soldier.
Attribution: Gene-Doctor Kronz, Thorathian Gene-Binding Journal One-Shot

Title: Field Marshal Tamar
Game Text: END PHASE This card deals the Hero target with the highest HP (H) minus 2 melee damage. Each Gene-Bound card deals that Hero target 1 melee damage.
Flavor Text: To your knees, pathetic denizens of this mudhole of a planet! You'll be gene-bound and finally made part of something worthwhile!

Title: Firesworn
Game Text: This card is immune to fire damage. END PHASE This card deals the Hero target with the highest HP 2 fire damage.
Flavor Text: Trodcullons were a race of barely sentient volcano dwellers. We gave them purpose as a combustion squad.
Attribution: Gene-Doctor Kronz, Thorathian Gene-Binding Journal One-Shot

Title: First Lieutenant Vyktor
Game Text: END PHASE This card deals the Hero character with the most cards in play (H) energy damage. Each Device card deals each Hero target 1 energy damage.
Flavor Text: You could surrender peacefully, but if I'm being honest, I prefer you resist. We could use a good stretch.

Title: Forced Deployment
Game Text: When this card is destroyed, shuffle the Villain trash into the Villain deck, then discover (H) Gene-Bound cards. START PHASE Destroy this card.
Flavor Text: You live and die by the whims of the Thorathian military! Bring the same devastation to these people that was visited upon your own planet!

Title: Frosthounds
Game Text: This card is immune to cold damage. END PHASE This card deals each Hero target 2 cold damage.
Flavor Text: The gene-binding of Gadrion Delta's Feethsmar predates my time here. The Grand Warlord has an unsubtle hand.
Attribution: Gene-Doctor Kronz, Thorathian Gene-Binding Journal One-Shot

Title: Gene-Doctor Kronz
Game Text: END PHASE Destroy (H) minus 2 Hero Ongoing and/or Item cards. Discover 1 Gene-Bound card.
Flavor Text: Twisted? If twisted is what you seek, step into my gene-clave!

Title: Grunt Guards
Game Text: This card is immune to melee damage. -1 damage dealt to Villain targets.
Flavor Text: The self-repairing flesh of the Ruoenf people was easily catalyzed into nigh-immortal front line troopers.
Attribution: Gene-Doctor Kronz, Thorathian Gene-Binding Journal One-Shot

Title: Ion-Lancers
Game Text: This card is immune to energy damage. END PHASE This card deals the Hero target with the lowest HP 2 energy damage.
Flavor Text: The agricultural Henathians were cowardly and weak. Their genetic material is now used for our deadliest reapers.
Attribution: Gene-Doctor Kronz, Thorathian Gene-Binding Journal One-Shot

Title: Protective Detail
Game Text: Shuffle the Villain trash into the Villain deck. Discover 1 Thorathian card. Discover (H) minus 1 Gene-Bound cards.
Flavor Text: You two, on me. We mustn't keep the Grand Warlord waiting.

Title: Psi-Weavers
Game Text: This card is immune to psychic damage. END PHASE This card deals each Hero target 2 psychic damage.
Flavor Text: After the obliteration of Piune Prime's intellectual meritocracy, we harvested cerebral matter for our psychic exterminators.
Attribution: Gene-Doctor Kronz, Thorathian Gene-Binding Journal One-Shot

Title: Quark-Drive Translocator
Game Text: START PHASE Play the top card of the Villain deck. END PHASE This card deals the Hero target with the lowest HP 1 energy damage.
Flavor Text: They will struggle for their little planet, thinking that if they can hold back our forces, they'll win. But my forces are infinite.
Attribution: Grand Warlord Voss, Cosmic Tales Vol. 2 #203

Title: Reso-Banshees
Game Text: This card is immune to sonic damage. END PHASE This card deals the Hero character with the most Ongoing cards in play 3 sonic damage.
Flavor Text: The harsh atmosphere of Vdronix resulted in powerful lungs and vocal chords. Easily weaponized.
Attribution: Gene-Doctor Kronz, Thorathian Gene-Binding Journal One-Shot

Title: Ruthless Approach
Game Text: Grand Warlord Voss deals the Hero target with the highest HP (H) melee damage. Grand Warlord Voss deals each Hero target 1 fire damage and 1 energy damage.
Flavor Text: I never mind an opportunity to get personally involved.
Attribution: Grand Warlord Voss, America's Finest Legacy #182

Title: Shock Infantry
Game Text: This card is immune to lightning damage. END PHASE This card deals the Hero target with the highest HP 3 lightning damage.
Flavor Text: I will see Voss's hideous work undone or perish in the process!

Title: TCF "Stalwart"
Game Text: END PHASE This card deals the 2 non-Villain targets with the highest HP 5 energy damage each. Then, discover 1 Gene-Bound or Thorathian card.
Flavor Text: Attacks from that massive ship are tearing the city apart! If I don't get up there, we won't have much of a planet left to defend!

Title: Thorathian Conquering Fleet
Game Text: END PHASE This card deals each Hero target 2 fire damage. Then, destroy (H) minus 2 Hero Ongoing and/or Item cards.
Flavor Text: The Thorathian fleet, here at my home planet? I had hoped this day would never come. This may well be the end of humanity as we know it.

Title: The Beast
Game Text: PART: 1 character in this play area deals the 3 targets with the highest HP 2 melee damage each, then regains 2 HP. RESIST: 1 character in this play area deals themself 2 fixed psychic damage.  END PHASE: Activate the PART on this card.
Flavor Text: The knee bone's connected to the… leg bone! But not for much longer!

Title: Cast Doubt
Game Text: Select 2 Role cards in Hero play areas. Move each selected Role card to the other play area. Grimm deals each Hero character in a play area with Role cards that moved this way 3 irreducible psychic damage.
Flavor Text: No, no, no; you were all ***far*** too successful playing those parts. Let's try the same scene again, but with a few changes.
Attribution: Grimm, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 4 #61

Title: A Cautionary Tale
Game Text: Discover 1 Role card, playing it in the Hero play area with the most tokens on Role cards. Move all tokens on Role cards in that play area to the card played this way. If there are 2 or more Role cards in that Hero play area, bury all Role cards with no tokens in that play area. Otherwise, activate the PART on the Role card in that play area.
Flavor Text: The prophesies have long fortold your coming! Hurry -- we haven't a moment to waste.
Attribution: Grimm, Virtuoso of the Void Vol. 1 #31

Title: The Chosen
Game Text: PART: Discover 1 Ongoing card. Each character not in this play area deals themself 1 fixed psychic damage. RESIST: Discard the top card of your deck. Destroy 1 non-character Hero card with no keywords matching the discarded card.  END PHASE: Activate the PART on this card.
Flavor Text: I cannot shrink from this responsibility, though both unwanted and unearned it may be. The world must be set aright!
Attribution: The Argent Adept, Virtuoso of the Void Vol. 1 #31

Title: The Companion
Game Text: PART: If this card is in the Villain play area, each Hero discards 1 card. If not, 1 ally Hero plays 1 card. RESIST: Each Hero with 4 or more cards in hand discards 1 card. Then, 1 Hero discards 1 card.  END PHASE: Activate the PART on this card.
Flavor Text: I fear what lies ahead, chosen one. Will you hold my hand and keep me safe?
Attribution: Grimm, Virtuoso of the Void Vol. 1 #31

Title: A Crooked Plan
Game Text: START PHASE: Add 1 token to each Role card with no tokens.  END PHASE: Select the Role card in a Hero play area with the fewest tokens on it and the Role card in the Villain play area with the most tokens on it. Move each selected Role card to the other play area.
Flavor Text: The stories have all led to this moment! Are you ready for ***The End?!***
Attribution: Grimm, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 4 #60

Title: The Cursed
Game Text: PART: 1 character in this play area deals the 3 characters with the lowest HP 1 infernal damage each, then regains 3 HP. RESIST: Discard your hand. Draw 3 cards.  END PHASE: Activate the PART on this card.
Flavor Text: You fear betraying your friends? Rest your mind at ease. After today, you have no friends.
Attribution: Grimm, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 4 #7

Title: The Fool
Game Text: PART: Discard the bottom card of this play area's deck. If it is not a One-Shot card, play it. RESIST: Play the bottom card of the Environment deck. If it is a target, it deals 1 character in this play area 2 melee damage.  END PHASE: Activate the PART on this card.
Flavor Text: Why won't anyone listen to me? We have to save the environment! It's really serious! I'm not joking!
Attribution: The Naturalist, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 4 #60

Title: The Hunter
Game Text: PART: 1 character in this play area deals the target other than itself with the highest HP 3 melee damage. RESIST: Discard 2 cards.  END PHASE: Activate the PART on this card.
Flavor Text: I don't wish harm upon NightMist, but the dread queen will kill me and my family if I do not dispose of her in the woods. What am I to do?

Title: The Innocent
Game Text: PART: Discard the top card of this play area's deck. If an Item card was not discarded this way, 1 character in this play area regains 6 HP. RESIST: Either discard 1 One-Shot card or discover 1 Ongoing card from the Villain deck.  END PHASE: Activate the PART on this card.
Flavor Text: Oh no. I sure hope there are no wolves around. So scary.

Title: Kill the Beast
Game Text: Discover 1 Role card. Activate the PART on each of these Role cards in this order: The Hunter, The Chosen, and The Cursed. After a Hero activates a RESIST this way, Grimm deals the Hero character with the highest HP (H) minus 1 melee damage.
Flavor Text: And thus we come to the moral of the story: the bigger they are, the harder they fall.

Title: Plot Armor
Game Text: -X damage dealt to Grimm, where X is the number of Role cards in Hero play areas.  START PHASE: Up to (H) minus 2 Heroes may activate the PART on a Role cards in their play area. If (H) minus 2 PARTs are activated this way, destroy this card.
Flavor Text: They looked from hero to villain, and from villain to hero, and from hero to villain again; but already it was impossible to say which was which.

Title: The Prince
Game Text: PART: The Hero with the most cards in hand discards 2 cards. If this card is in a Hero play area, draw up to 3 cards. RESIST: Discard 1 card, then discard each card in your hand that shares a keyword with that card.  END PHASE: Activate the PART on this card.
Flavor Text: My father is… the king? Yes, of course that's right. I am the valiant prince, after all.
Attribution: Fanatic, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 4 #60

Title: Scene Change
Game Text: After this card is played, bury the Villain trash and discover 1 Role card, playing it in the Villain play area. Move all tokens on Role cards in the Villain play area to the most recently played Role card.  END PHASE: Play the top card of the Environment deck. If it is a target, it deals the Hero target with the highest HP 2 fire damage.
Flavor Text: …and none of them lived happily ever after.
Attribution: Grimm, Ra: God of the Sun Vol. 1 #192

Title: Spin Straw Into Gold
Game Text: Each Hero activates the RESIST on a Role card in their play area. Each player may discard up to 3 cards. If (H) or more are discarded this way, remove 1 token from each Role card in play.
Flavor Text: Names do have power, but the more they're used, the less potent they are. Now, consider a name that has never been uttered…

Title: Stolen Voice
Game Text: Discover 1 Role card. Activate the PART on each of these Role cards in this order: The Witch, The Prince, and The Companion. After a Hero activates a RESIST this way, (H) minus 2 Heroes each discard 1 card.
Flavor Text: Of course I trust you, Portja. If you believe your newfound powers are under control, then I'm up for whatever spell it takes to make things right.
Attribution: Young Legacy, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 4 #11

Title: The Story Unfolds
Game Text: Discover 1 Role card. Activate the PART on each Role card in the Villain play area. Activate the PART on a Role card in each Hero play area in turn order. If any RESIST is activated this way, play the top of the Villain deck.
Flavor Text: I get it now. ***You're*** the connecting thread in all your tales. I don't much care to find out just where that thread leads.
Attribution: Rambler, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 2 #100

Title: Tales Retold
Game Text: Bury the 2 Role cards in Hero play areas with the fewest tokens on them. Shuffle the Villain trash into the Villain deck. Discover 2 Role cards, playing them in the play areas of the 2 Hero characters with the lowest HP and no Role cards.
Flavor Text: Hello, readers. You may not remember me, but I remember you. I have so many stories to tell you.
Attribution: Grimm, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 4 #1

Title: What Big Teeth
Game Text: Discover 1 Role card. Activate the PART on each of these Role cards in this order: The Beast, The Innocent, and The Fool. After a Hero activates a RESIST this way, Grimm deals the Hero character with the lowest HP (H) minus 2 psychic damage.
Flavor Text: I may be misrememberin', but this aint the way this story goes…

Title: The Witch
Game Text: PART: 1 Hero draws 2 cards. If this card is in a Villain play area, destroy 1 Hero Ongoing card. RESIST: Destroy 1 Item or Ongoing card in the Hero play area with the most cards.  END PHASE: Activate the PART on this card.
Flavor Text: Two bubbles! Hard work! Predicaments? …I am not understanding how this story goes.
Attribution: Sky-Scraper, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 4 #11

Title: Airborne Assault
Game Text: Iron Legacy deals the Hero target with the highest HP (H) melee damage. Play the top card of the Villain deck.
Flavor Text: Your meddling in my realm will not be tolerated! Prepare to face justice!

Title: Demoralizing Presence
Game Text: Iron Legacy is immune to damage dealt by Environment targets.  END PHASE: Iron Legacy regains (H) HP. The (H) minus 2 Heroes with the most cards in hand discard 1 card each.
Flavor Text: The bleakest of times is the work of one of time's greatest heroes.

Title: Ever Vigilant
Game Text: After a Villain Ongoing card is buried or destroyed, Iron Legacy regains 1 HP. After the first time Iron Legacy is dealt damage by any target other than himself each turn, Iron Legacy deals the attacker 2 melee damage.
Flavor Text: I have one chance to make this work. If it fails… we all fall.

Title: Final Evolution
Game Text: Iron Legacy regains (H) HP. Discover (H) minus 2 Ongoing cards.
Flavor Text: What now, hero?! What has your legacy wrought?!
Attribution: Baron Blade, The Fall of Legacy One-Shot

Title: Former Allies
Game Text: Each Hero character deals themself 2 fixed psychic damage. Each Hero discards 1 card.
Flavor Text: Friends are merely weaknesses waiting to be exploited.
Attribution: Legacy, The Fall of Legacy One-Shot

Title: Furious Charge
Game Text: END PHASE: Iron Legacy deals the Hero target with the highest HP (H) melee damage. Iron Legacy regains (H) HP.
Flavor Text: That's the thing -- you ***did*** give me hope. I'd started to think that you were different. Guess I was right all along.

Title: Galvanized
Game Text: +1 damage dealt by Iron Legacy.  END PHASE: Iron Legacy deals the Hero target with the highest HP 2 irreducible melee damage.
Flavor Text: There is no longer a legacy to further. So be it.
Attribution: Legacy, The Fall of Legacy One-Shot

Title: Grim Determination
Game Text: After Iron Legacy is dealt damage by a Hero target, he regains 1 HP.  END PHASE: If Iron Legacy has 8 or fewer HP, Iron Legacy regains 8 HP. Then, bury this card.
Flavor Text: Nothing you say matters. I ***will*** bring justice to this world.

Title: Heartless Haymaker
Game Text: Iron Legacy deals the (H) minus 1 Hero targets with the highest HP 2 melee and 2 projectile damage each. Destroy 1 Environment card.
Flavor Text: You are all ***weak!*** There is no room for such spinelessness if we are to have justice.

Title: Heroic Termination
Game Text: Discover 1 Ongoing card. Iron Legacy deals the Hero target witth the highest HP X irreducible melee damage, where X is the number of Villain Ongoing cards in play.
Flavor Text: Something broke him. All this Legacy has left is to break everything else.
Attribution: The Visionary, America's Finest Legacy Vol. 1 #201

Title: Iron Eye
Game Text: Damage dealt by Iron Legacy is irreducible.  END PHASE: Iron Legacy deals the Hero target with the lowest HP (H) minus 2 melee damage.
Flavor Text: Even you can't move fast enough to avoid lightni--

Title: Iron Fortitude
Game Text: -1 damage dealt to Iron Legacy. After Iron Legacy is dealt damage by a Hero target, that Hero target deals itself 1 fixed psychic damage.
Flavor Text: I hit him as hard as I could, and he did not flinch. I do not know this man.

Title: KRAKK!
Game Text: Iron Legacy deals the Hero target with the highest HP (H) plus 2 melee damage. Each Hero target deals itself 1 fixed psychic damage.
Flavor Text: There is no room for mercy. Your punishment shall be swift.
Attribution: Iron Legacy, Freedom Five Annual Vol. 1 #25

Title: The New Order
Game Text: Destroy all Environment Ongoing cards. Destroy 1 Hero Ongoing card. Shuffle the Villain trash into the Villain deck. Discover (H) minus 2 Ongoing cards.
Flavor Text: We don't want to learn about their version of ***order*** and ***justice*** firsthand.

Title: No More Heroes
Game Text: Destroy (H) Hero Ongoing and/or Item cards. Discover 1 Ongoing card.
Flavor Text: Don't you get it? We're ***not*** a team anymore. There are no heroes. There is only justice.

Title: Rule From the Front
Game Text: Whenever Iron Legacy would be dealt 8 or more damage at once, prevent that damage. Then, bury this card.  END PHASE: Destroy 1 Item card. If no cards are destroyed this way, shuffle each trash into its deck, then discover 1 Ongoing card.
Flavor Text: It won't take him long to get through the suit. Get to safety while you can! This is the end of the line for me.

Title: The Adhin Talisman
Game Text: -X damage dealt to Kismet, where X is the number of Unlucky cards in play. +1 damage dealt by Kismet.
Flavor Text: She has always believed that her family talisman is what makes her lucky. No matter how much evidence there is otherwise.

Title: Fortune's Smile
Game Text: Kismet regains (H) plus 3 HP. Kismet deals each Hero target 3 psychic damage. Play the top card of the villain deck.
Flavor Text: Welcome back, your majesty! We, your loyal subjects, have greatly missed you, our High Queen of planet Earth!

Title: Glass Jaw
Game Text: Play this card in the play area with the Hero character with the highest HP. +1 damage dealt to targets in this play area.
Flavor Text: Did that hurt? I can pretend to be sorry, if it'll help.

Title: Hot Streak
Game Text: Kismet deals each non-Villain target 2 fire damage. Discover 1 Unlucky card.
Flavor Text: Careful, there! The safety regulations here seem awfully lax.

Title: Inconceivable Obstruction
Game Text: If Kismet would be dealt 3 or more damage, reveal the top card of the Environment deck. If it is a target, play it and redirect the damage to it. If it is not a target, discard it.
Flavor Text: Aahh! Shark! Why is there a shark?!

Title: Karmic Disjunction
Game Text: Play this card in the play area with the Hero character with the lowest HP. END PHASE Destroy 1 Hero Ongoing or Item card in this play area.
Flavor Text: What is happening?! Young lady, I'm going to have to insist you stop interfering with my powers at once!

Title: Lady Luck
Game Text: After a Lucky card is played, Kismet regains 2 HP. After an Unlucky card is played, 1 Hero discards 1 card.
Flavor Text: He's here to open things that don't want to open. You're here to make things just happen to go our way. Just stand around and be lucky, got it?

Title: Like a Charm
Game Text: Summon The Adhin Talisman. Discover 1 Lucky card.
Flavor Text: There you are! I've been looking all over for you! I'll never know how you ended up here, but you always do come back to me, at least.
Attribution: Kismet, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 4 #62

Title: Scattered Mind
Game Text: Play this card in the play area of the Hero with the most cards in hand. After this Hero draws a card, each target in this play area deals itself 1 fixed psychic damage.
Flavor Text: Ugh! My... memories-- give them back to me!

Title: Shaky Arm
Game Text: Play this card in the play area of the Hero with the most cards in play. -1 damage dealt by targets in this play area.
Flavor Text: Awww. Look at your gun wobble! You couldn't hit the broad side of a barn!

Title: Shared Fate
Game Text: After Kismet is dealt damage by a non-Villain target, Kismet deals the same amount of fixed energy damage to the Hero target with the highest HP. START PHASE The Hero target with the highest HP may deal themselves 3 fixed psychic damage. If they take damage this way, destroy this card.
Flavor Text: You've been a pain in my side ever since you showed back up in Pete's life, and I'm ready for some high-strength painkillers!

Title: Two Left Feet
Game Text: Play this card in the play area of the Hero with the most cards in their trash. After this Hero plays a card, each target in this play area deals itself 1 fixed psychic damage.
Flavor Text: Slow down, slugger! Anyone ever tell you that you're moving too fast?

Title: Unlucky Break
Game Text: Discover (H) minus 1 Unlucky cards. Each Hero target in a play area with any Unlucky cards deals themself 2 fixed psychic damage. Destroy 1 Environment card.
Flavor Text: I am not sure if you call it a ceiling, or a roof? Or, because we are in a tunnel, is it something else? Either way, it comes down now!

Title: Weak Heart
Game Text: Play this card in the play area of the Hero with the fewest cards in hand. Targets in this play area cannot regain HP.
Flavor Text: You look pretty worn out. Probably best to just throw in the towel. Call it a day. Hang up the cape. Wait, why don't you have a cape, anyway?

Title: The Amazing Mable
Game Text: This card is immune to melee and projectile damage.  END PHASE: Destroy 1 Hero Ongoing or Item card.
Flavor Text: Let's see what you've got, sugar!
Attribution: The Amazing Mable, La Paradoja Magnifica One-Shot

Title: Battle-Forged
Game Text: +1 damage dealt by this card.  END PHASE: This card deals the non-Villain target with the second highest HP (H) minus 1 melee damage.
Flavor Text: A warrior of legend stands before you! Stand and face me, or run and die tired!

Title: Captain's Orders
Game Text: END PHASE: The Villain target with the lowest HP deals the Hero target with the highest HP (H) plus 1 melee damage. That target's Hero puts 1 card from their hand under La Capitan's character card.
Flavor Text: I want their heads, and I want them yesterday! Actually yesterday!
Attribution: La Capitan, The Tides of Time #3

Title: Chip
Game Text: After this card deals damage to a Hero character, discard the top card of that Hero's deck.  END PHASE: This card deals the 2 Hero targets with the highest HP (H) minus 2 projectile damage.
Flavor Text: The captain found this fancy flyer for me, so I'm more than happy to follow her orders to deal with you!

Title: Chiquito
Game Text: After a Hero card is discarded during the Villain turn, put that card under La Capitan's character card.  END PHASE: Discard the top card of the deck of the Hero with the most cards in hand.
Flavor Text: Come, little pícaro. What have you found for me? You always bring me such sweet presents.
Attribution: La Capitan, La Paradoja Magnifica One-Shot

Title: Final Breath
Game Text: After this card deals toxic damage to a target, if that target has 2 or fewer HP, destroy it.  END PHASE: This card deals the 2 non-Villain targets with the lowest HP (H) minus 2 toxic damage each.
Flavor Text: There is no honor in this kill, but the demands of the blade must be met, and I am not yet ready to pay that price.

Title: A Fine Vessel
Game Text: La Paradoja Magnifica deals the Hero target with the highest HP 2 projectile damage and 2 fire damage. If La Paradoja Magnifica is not in play, destroy 2 random cards under La Capitan's character card and summon La Paradoja Magnifica.
Flavor Text: ¡Que bonita! She knows well the sea of time.
Attribution: La Capitan, La Paradoja Magnifica One-Shot

Title: L'Épéiste
Game Text: After this card deals damage to a Hero character, that Hero discards 1 card.  END PHASE: This card deals the Hero character of the Hero with the most cards in hand (H) minus 2 energy damage.
Flavor Text: Are you the challenge I have been seeking? En garde!

Title: La Paradoja Magnifica
Game Text: If there are any Crew cards in play, -2 damage dealt to this card.  END PHASE: Discover 1 Crew card. If no cards are played this way, bury the Villain trash, then this card deals the Hero target with the highest HP 2 projectile damage and 2 fire damage.
Flavor Text: Haul on the main brace! Roll out the guns! Prepare to board!
Attribution: La Capitan, The Tides of Time #1

Title: A Motley Crew
Game Text: Shuffle all Crew cards from the Villain trash into the Villain deck. Discover (H) minus 2 Crew cards.
Flavor Text: Out of the breach, you scurvy devils! Somebody's getting paid!
Attribution: La Capitan, The Tides of Time #4

Title: Plunder
Game Text: Put the top card of the Environment deck under La Capitan's character card. Destroy (H) minus 2 Hero Ongoing or Item cards.
Flavor Text: She uses purloined materials to access nodes along the timestream. The more she takes, the further she ventures.

Title: Siege-Breaker
Game Text: -1 damage dealt to this card.  END PHASE: This card deals the 2 Hero targets with the highest HP (H) minus 2 fire damage each.
Flavor Text: Drizzarsi, you cowards! Ready yourselves for combat!

Title: A Taste of the Grape
Game Text: La Paradoja Magnifica deals each Hero target 2 projectile damage. If La Paradoja Magnifica is not in play, play the top card of the Villain deck.
Flavor Text: If she can unleash this much firepower so easily, we're going to need a new plan.
Attribution: The Naturalist, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 3 #243

Title: Temporal Raider
Game Text: Reveal the top card of each Hero deck. Discard all One-Shot cards revealed this way. Put the other revealed cards under La Capitan's character card. La Capitan deals the Hero target with the highest HP (H) irreducible energy damage.
Flavor Text: Mere loot is not enough! I can have all of time now, and nothing can stop me from taking it!

Title: Trueshot
Game Text: Damage dealt by this card is irreducible.  END PHASE: This card deals the Hero target with the highest HP (H) projectile damage.
Flavor Text: I can hit a running target while riding a horse at a gallop, and you think a little zig-zagging will save you?

Title: Walk the Plank!
Game Text: END PHASE: Put the top card of the deck of the Hero character with the highest HP under La Capitan's character card. If there are 4 or more cards under La Capitan's character card, La Capitan deals that Hero character (H) melee damage, each Hero character deals themself 1 fixed psychic damage, then destroy this card.
Flavor Text: Your day of reckoning is at hand! Embrace eternity!
Attribution: La Capitan, The Tides of Time #5

Title: The Auditor
Game Text: START PHASE: If Aminia Twain is active, each Hero discards 1 card.  END PHASE: This card deals the Hero character with the highest HP (H) minus 2 psychic damage, then shuffle that Hero's trash into their deck.
Flavor Text: You sure there aren't any \*AHEM\* extracurricular activities you want to account for here, Miss Montgomery? Something's not adding up.

Title: Blade Battalion Commandos
Game Text: START PHASE: If Aminia Twain is active, destroy 1 Hero Ongoing card.  END PHASE: This card deals the Hero Target with the highest HP 3 energy damage. If there are 10 or more cards in the Villain trash, this card deals each Hero target 2 sonic damage.
Flavor Text: What? Of course they're not mine! Do they sing of the glory of Mordengrad? Do they shine as the moon on a clea night? Imposters!

Title: Citizen Burn
Game Text: START PHASE: This card deals Aminia Twain 2 fire damage.  END PHASE: This card deals the 2 Hero targets with the highest HP (H) minus 2 fire damage each.
Flavor Text: Well, well, well. If it isn't America's Most Flammable Legacy. Looks like it's my day in the sun!
Attribution: Citizen Burn, America's Finest Legacy Vol. 1 #395

Title: Communications Scramble
Game Text: Play this card in the Hero play area with the most Hero Ongoing cards.  END PHASE: Either destroy 1 Hero Ongoing card in this play area or 1 Hero character in this play area deal themself 2 fixed sonic damage.
Flavor Text: That was the most heinous sound these communicators have ever produced. Everyone ok? Anyone have eyes on Legacy?

Title: Concealed Betrayal
Game Text: Each Hero discards 1 card. Destroy the Environment target with the lowest HP. Discover 1 Clue card.
Flavor Text: It's impressive. All these super-powers and super geniuses, and ***you're*** the one who figures it out. I couldn't let you put it all together, of course.

Title: Diversionary Tactics
Game Text: Discover (H) minus 2 Distraction cards. Miss Information regains X HP, where X is the number of Distraction cards in play.
Flavor Text: Oh, look. The Freedom Fools are in trouble again. Such a shame that their faithful secretary is out of the office today.

Title: Faulty Wiring
Game Text: Play this card in the Hero play area with the most Item cards.  END PHASE: Either destroy 1 Item card in this play area or 1 Hero target in this play area deals itself 2 fixed lightning damage.
Flavor Text: I swear it wasn't me! I mean, sure, I was there, but the suits all started sparking on their own!

Title: First Mate Davenport
Game Text: START PHASE: If Aminia Twain is active, destroy 1 Item card.  END PHASE: This card deals each non-Villain target 1 energy damage.
Flavor Text: Arr, mateys! I be marooned, but yer ever-so-helpful Aminia Twain told me that you have a way back to me ship! You'll be given it to me, now.
Attribution: First Mate Davenport, Freedom Five Vol. 1 #663

Title: Granogg
Game Text: START PHASE: If Aminia Twain is active, this card regains (H) HP.  END PHASE: This card deals the non-Villain target with the highest HP (H) minus 2 melee damage and (H) minus 2 fire damage.
Flavor Text: Hah! A stout fight, old foe! But we must take this to a less populated arena.

Title: Kyng Javelinn
Game Text: START PHASE: If Aminia Twain is active, this card deals the (H) minus 2 Hero targets with the lowest HP 2 projectile damage each.  END PHASE: This card deals the Hero target with the highest HP (H) minus 1 projectile damage.
Flavor Text: Kaargra swore she'd leave me and my friends alone! That means no more big stupid gladiators making a mess in my new apartment!

Title: Midnight Alerts
Game Text: Play this card in the play area of the Hero character with the lowest HP.  END PHASE: Either discard 1 One-Shot or Item card, or 1 Hero character in this play area deals themself 2 fixed psychic damage.
Flavor Text: Up and at 'em, go go go! This is the fourth middle-of-the-night alert this week -- if crime doesn't sleep, then neither do we! Come on, Devra!

Title: Mind Torn in Twain
Game Text: Miss Information deals herself 2 fixed psychic damage. Destroy (H) minus 2 Hero Ongoing cards. Shuffle the Villain trash into the Villain deck. Discover 1 Clue card.
Flavor Text: When that Aminia died, her mind came here, took over your Aminia Twain, and became Miss Information. It's tragic, really.

Title: Misplaced Memo
Game Text: -1 damage dealt to Distraction cards. -1 damage dealt to Miss Information.
Flavor Text: Put it with the rest of the anonymous tips and letters from conspiracy nutjobs. Can't tell you the last time anyone sent me anything worthwhile.

Title: Nyxian Scourge Kel'Brak
Game Text: START PHASE: If Aminia Twain is active, this card deals the Hero target with the second lowest HP (H) minus 1 melee damage.  END PHASE: This card deals the Hero target with the highest HP (H) minus 1 melee damage.
Flavor Text: The transmission indicated the denizens of this planet could answer for what happened to the Grand Warlord. Tell me everything, or else.
Attribution: Major Kel'Brak, America's Finest Legacy Vol. 1 #399

Title: Rebuilt S-77 Pursuer Drone
Game Text: START PHASE: If Aminia Twain is active, this card deals the 2 Hero targets with the highest HP 2 lightning damage each.  END PHASE: This card deals the Hero target with the lowest HP 2 irreducile lightning damage.
Flavor Text: Of parent design and make, certainly, but not operation. This unit detects no connection to the Omni-mainframe.

Title: Secrets and Lies
Game Text: Miss Information deals each Hero character 2 psychic damage. The Hero character with the highest HP deals themself (H) fixed psychic damage. If Aminia Twain is active, discover 1 Distraction card.
Flavor Text: And they call you ***heroes***. What a joke. No wonder you can't actually save the people you claim to care about the most.
Attribution: Miss Information, Freedom Five Annual Vol. 1 #21

Title: Tainted Coffee
Game Text: Play this card in the Hero play area of the Hero with the most cards in hand.  END PHASE: You may discard 1 One-Shot or Ongoing card. If no cards are discarded this way, 1 Hero character in this play area deals themself 2 fixed toxic damage.
Flavor Text: Oh, one last thing: your office creamer stash must be going bad. This is the worst coffee I've had in weeks!

Title: Atrophic Radiance
Game Text: END PHASE: Add 1 token to each Hero character card. Each Hero with 3 or more tokens on a character card in their play area discards 1 card.
Flavor Text: The good nes is we now know what his plan is. Pretty much all of the rest of the news is bad.
Attribution: Parse, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 3 #162

Title: Bloated Husk
Game Text: When this card is destroyed by melee damage, it deals the (H) non-Villain targets with the highest HP 2 toxic damage each.  END PHASE: This card deals itself and the Hero target with the second highest HP 2 melee damage each.
Flavor Text: Be careful, my fiery friend! These foes break easily, but also quite painfully!
Attribution: Haka, Ra: God of the Sun Vol. 1 #381

Title: Caustic Husk
Game Text: When this card is destroyed by toxic damage, it deals the 3 non-Villain targets with the highest HP (H) projectile damage each.  END PHASE: This card deals itself and the Hero target with the highest HP 3 toxic damage each.
Flavor Text: Data on husk putrescence is… inconclusive. Requires more testing. ***Field*** testing, ideally.
Attribution: Necrosis, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 3 #162

Title: Chaff From Wheat
Game Text: Necrosis deals the (H) minus 2 Hero targets with the highest HP 2 projectile damage each. Bury the Villain trash. Discover (H) minus 2 Husk cards.
Flavor Text: This must \*KOFF KOFF\* be the same stuff he uses to make those terrible husks! Try not to breath it in…
Attribution: The Naturalist, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 3 #161

Title: Decay Harnessed
Game Text: END PHASE: Necrosis deals the non-Villain target with the highest HP (H) minus 2 energy damage. If a Hero character card is dealt damage this way, destroy 1 Hero Ongoing or Item card.
Flavor Text: You keep telling us that we'll be fine, but I gotta say, I am ***not*** feeling fine right now.

Title: Green Energy
Game Text: END PHASE: Necrosis deals the Hero character with the highest HP 3 energy damage. Necrosis regains X HP, where X is the numer of tokens on that Hero character card.
Flavor Text: Energy can be generated in many ways. All have costs. Nothing is free.

Title: Half-Life
Game Text: END PHASE: Remove 1 token from each Hero character card with an odd number of tokens on it. Then, the Hero character with the most tokens on their character card deals themself X fixed energy damage, where X is half the number of tokens on that Hero character card.
Flavor Text: I thought this blight… urrghhh… was painful before. I can't handle much more of this agony!

Title: Rancid Slash
Game Text: Necrosis deals the Hero character with the second highest HP (H) minus 2 toxic damage. Necrosis deals the Hero character with the highest HP (H) energy damage.
Flavor Text: Sir, please step away from the reactor and remove your helmet. We don't want any more trouble… Oh! You apparently ***do*** want trouble!

Title: Rotten Pulsar
Game Text: END PHASE: Necrosis deals the (H) minus 1 non-Villain targets with the highest HP 1 irreducible toxic damage each.
Flavor Text: ***Potential*** method of augmenting energy distribution. Effect carries… unexpected elements. Not without use.

Title: Unstable Husk
Game Text: When this card is destroyed by energy damage, destroy (H) minus 1 Hero Ongoing and/or Item cards.  END PHASE: This card deals itself and the Hero target with the second lowest HP 2 energy damage each.
Flavor Text: Not what I wanted. Irrelevant. What has occurred. Hypothesis: husks make a powerful army, though fragile.
Attribution: Necrosis, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 3 #52

Title: Wither and Wilt
Game Text: Add (H) minus 2 tokens to the Hero character with the lowest HP. Each Hero character card with at least 2 tokens on it deals itself 1 fixed toxic damage. Each Hero character with at least 3 tokens on their card destroys 1 Ongoing or Item card in their play area.
Flavor Text: His power rots all living things -- the creatures of the land and sky, and even the plants of the Earth! He must e stopped, at all costs.
Attribution: The Naturalist, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 3 #53

Title: World of Decay
Game Text: Add 1 token to the (H) minus 2 Hero character cards with the fewest tokens. Each Hero with any tokens on their character card discards 1 card. The Hero character with the highest HP deals themself X fixed energy damage, where X is the number of tokens on that Hero character card.
Flavor Text: Scope of this experiment… unlimited. Results worth whatever consequences. ***Only*** way to get necessary results.
Attribution: Necrosis, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 3 #227

Title: Adaptive Plating Subroutine
Game Text: EXTERMINATE Omnitron deals the (H) Hero targets with the highest HP 1 lightning, 1 energy, and 1 toxic damage each. FABRICATE Until the Villain START PHASE, after Omnitron is dealt a type of damage, Omnitron becomes immune to that type of damage for the rest of the turn.
Flavor Text: The fires of Ra can melt steel beams! How is this robotic monstrocity not burning?!

Title: Disintegration Ray
Game Text: EXTERMINATE Omnitron deals (H) energy damage to the Hero target with the lowest HP. FABRICATE If there are more than (H) Villain Ongoing cards in play, destroy 1 Villain Ongoing card. If a card is destroyed this way, bury the top card of each Hero trash.
Flavor Text: One direct hit from that thing and I'm back in the cryo chamber for a week. And that's me being hopeful here.

Title: Electro-Magnetic Railgun
Game Text: EXTERMINATE Omnitron deals the 2 Hero targets with the highest HP (H) projectile damage each. FABRICATE If there are more than (H) Villain Ongoing cards in play, destroy 1 Villain Ongoing card. If a card is destroyed this way, each Hero discards 1 card.
Flavor Text: This collection of man-made trash dares to assault an angel of the Lord?! There can be no absolution for you!

Title: Electro-Pulse Explosive
Game Text: EXTERMINATE This card deals the (H) Hero targets with the highest HP 3 lightning damage each. FABRICATE Until the villain START PHASE, -1 damage dealt to Device cards.
Flavor Text: It's already gone off once. I don't think this building can survive another round!

Title: Flechette Launcher
Game Text: EXTERMINATE Omnitron deals the Hero character with the highest HP X toxic damage, where X is the number of Ongoing cards in that Hero's play area plus 1. FABRICATE Destroy (H) minus 2 Hero Ongoing cards.
Flavor Text: Your strength cannot save you. You are still made of flesh. Flesh is inherently weak.

Title: Protomatter Converter
Game Text: EXTERMINATE Destroy 1 Environment card. Play the top card of the Environment deck. FABRICATE Play the top card of the Villain deck.
Flavor Text: In principle, a molecular-decoupling wave could realign protomatter at the subatomic level.

Title: S-83 Assault Drones
Game Text: EXTERMINATE This card deals the 2 Hero targets with the lowest HP (H) minus 1 melee damage each. FABRICATE Until the Villain START PHASE, after any Device card is dealt damage by a Hero target, this card deals the attacker 2 melee damage.
Flavor Text: Hundreds of those skittering knife-legged robots surrounded me! It was great!

Title: S-84 Automaton Drones
Game Text: EXTERMINATE This card deals the 3 Hero targets with the highest HP (H) minus 1 energy damage each. FABRICATE Discover 1 Device card.
Flavor Text: The endless sounds of stomping metal feet filled the air. There was no element of surprise. They didn't need it.

Title: S-85 Repair Drones
Game Text: EXTERMINATE The (H) minus 1 Device cards with the lowest HP regain 3 HP each. FABRICATE Each Device card regains 1 HP. Shuffle the Villain trash into the Villain deck.
Flavor Text: Damage dealt to hull can be repaired. Omnitron is not this physical form. The Omni-code is everywhere.

Title: Singularity Projector
Game Text: EXTERMINATE Omnitron deals the Hero character with the highest HP X lightning damage, where X is the number of Item cards in that Hero's play area plus 1. FABRICATE Destroy (H) minus 2 Item cards.
Flavor Text: Assuming direct control...

Title: Fatal Disease
Game Text: Play this card next to an active non-Infected Hero character. If there are none, discard this card and Plague Rat regains (H) HP. The target next to this card is INFECTED. After it is incapacitated, bury this card. START PHASE Either 1 Hero discards 2 cards or this target deals themself 4 fixed toxic damage.
Flavor Text: Even worse, its claws impart a deadly infection to any victim unlucky enough to survive the attack.

Title: Lurking Plague
Game Text: If there are fewer than (H) Villain Ongoing cards in play, discover 1 Ongoing card. Plague Rat deals the Hero target with the highest HP 3 melee damage. Each INFECTED Hero character deals itself 1 toxic damage.
Flavor Text: Something does live down here. And it's gross.

Title: Maddening Disorder
Game Text: Play this card next to an active non-Infected Hero character. If there are none, discard this card and Plague Rat regains (H) HP. The target next to this card is INFECTED. After it is incapacitated, bury this card. START PHASE This target deals the Hero target with the highest HP 2 toxic damage.
Flavor Text: I fear it is too late! To save our ally now would require a miracle.

Title: Noxious Bite
Game Text: Plague Rat deals the Hero target with the highest HP (H) toxic damage. If there are fewer than (H) Villain Ongoing cards in play, discover 1 Ongoing card. Destroy X Hero Ongoing cards, where X is the number of Villain Ongoing cards in play.
Flavor Text: You bite me?! Hah, what a maniac! Oh, now I don't feel so good.
Attribution: Haka, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 2 #17

Title: Plague Locus
Game Text: +1 damage dealt by Plague Rat and all INFECTED targets. END PHASE Discover 1 Ongoing card.
Flavor Text: Hold up. Something up ahead smells... different. Worse, if you can believe that.

Title: Ravage
Game Text: Plague Rat deals each Hero target 2 melee damage. Shuffle the Villain trash into the Villain deck. If there are fewer than (H) Villain Ongoing cards in play, discover 1 Ongoing card.
Flavor Text: So long as we don't get infected, and it doesn't get a taste for your blood, I don't think we'll have any trouble.

Title: Sewer Snacks
Game Text: Destroy 1 Item card. Plague Rat regains (H) HP. Each non-Infected Hero character deals themself 2 fixed psychic damage.
Flavor Text: This should keep the beast at bay while-- or! He could just eat it! That could be what happens!

Title: Slavering Slasher
Game Text: Plague Rat deals the Hero target with the highest HP 1 melee damage. Then, Plague Rat deals the Hero target with the highest HP 2 melee damage. Then, Plague Rat deals the Hero target with the highest HP 3 melee damage.
Flavor Text: It's here. We were wrong! It's definitely still here!

Title: Tooth and Claw
Game Text: Shuffle the Villain trash into the Villain deck. Plague Rat deals the Hero target with the highest HP 3 melee damage. If that target is not INFECTED, discover 1 Villain Ongoing card and play it next to that target.
Flavor Text: Careful, now. Beasts like this fella are at their most dangerous when they're cornered.

Title: Wasting Sickness
Game Text: Play this card next to an active non-Infected Hero character. If there are none, discard this card and Plague Rat regains (H) HP. The target next to this card is INFECTED. After it is incapacitated, bury this card. START PHASE This target deals itself 2 fixed toxic damage.
Flavor Text: Tarnation. That's not good. I'll be needin' an extraction, pronto.

Title: Bloody Summer
Game Text: Whenever damage is redirected from a Bystander card to a Hero target, double that damage after applying all other modifiers. END PHASE Spite deals the target other than himself with the lowest HP (H) melee damage.
Flavor Text: I'm around every corner. In every alley. Behind every curtain. Don't ever think you've found somewhere safe. You can't stop the summer.

Title: Can You Save Them?
Game Text: Discover 2 Bystander cards. Spite deals the 2 targets other than himself with the lowest HP (H) melee damage each. If no Bystander cards were destroyed this way, remove 1 Bystander card in play from the game, destroy 1 Villain Ongoing card, and play the top card of the Villain deck.
Flavor Text: Can you really call yourself a hero if you can't save the people you love?

Title: Chaos and Disorder
Game Text: Spite deals the Hero target with the highest HP (H) projectile damage. Spite deals each target other than himself 2 fire damage. Add (H) tokens to Spite's character card.
Flavor Text: The longer we draw this out, the worse things are going to get!

Title: Chimaeric Mutagen
Game Text: START PHASE Discard the top card of the Villain deck. If it is an Ongoing card, play it. Then, if there are 3 or more tokens on Spite's character card, remove 1 of them and Spite regains (H) HP.
Flavor Text: You think your little toys will slow me down? The fun is just getting started!

Title: Demon's Kiss
Game Text: START PHASE Spite deals the target other than himself with the highest HP 2 melee damage and 2 infernal damage. Then, if there are 3 or more tokens on Spite's character card, remove 1 of them and destroy 1 Item card.
Flavor Text: I can feel your blood pulse in your veins. It cries out to be set free -- who am I to stand in its way?

Title: Good Samaritan
Game Text: [This Villain card is an Environment target and not a Villain target] When this card would be dealt damage, you may redirect that damage to a Hero target. When this card is destroyed, destroy (H) Hero Ongoing and/or Item cards. END PHASE 1 target regains 2 HP.
Flavor Text: Yes, Father, I do hunger...

Title: Lab Tech
Game Text: [This Villain card is an Environment target and not a Villain target] When this card would be dealt damage, you may redirect that damage to a Hero target. When this card is destroyed, discover 1 Ongoing card from Spite's deck. END PHASE 1 Hero draws 1 card.
Flavor Text: He was showing highly abnormal spikes in both temperature and bioactivity... and then the readings suddenly stopped?
Attribution: Lab Tech, Prelude of the Soulless One-Shot

Title: Lost Child
Game Text: [This Villain card is an Environment target and not a Villain target] When this card would be dealt damage, you may redirect that damage to a Hero target. When this card is destroyed, each Hero character deals itself 3 fixed psychic damage. END PHASE Reveal the top card of 1 non-Villain deck. Replace it or discard it.
Flavor Text: I'm glad you found us. I'm not scared, but Mister Bear was!

Title: Lost in the Crowd
Game Text: While there are any Bystander cards in play, Spite is immune to damage. START PHASE Bury up to 2 Bystander cards. Whenever a card is buried this way, destroy 1 Villain Ongoing card. Then, if there are no Bystander cards in play, play the top card of the Villain deck and destroy this card.
Flavor Text: Your eyes move from person to person, dismissing anything registered as normal behavior, seeking something out of place. You'll never see him.

Title: Mynd-Phyre
Game Text: START PHASE Spite deals each target other than himself 1 psychic damage. Then, if there are 3 or more tokens on Spite's character card, remove 1 of them and destroy 1 Hero Ongoing card.
Flavor Text: You heroes are all the same. So predictable. So breakable.

Title: On the Prowl
Game Text: START PHASE If there are no Bystander cards in play, shuffle the Villain trash into the Villain deck, discover (H) minus 2 Bystander cards, and destroy this card. END PHASE Spite deals the target other than himself with the lowest HP 2 melee damage.
