Flavor Text: Lot of danger in this city. People shouldn't have to be scared so close to home. But they've got good reason to be.

Title: Relentless Stalker
Game Text: Damage dealt by Spite is irreducible. START PHASE Spite deals the target other than himself with the lowest HP 1 melee damage. Bury the Villain trash.
Flavor Text: I'm getting really sick of killing this guy.

Title: Sadistic Choice
Game Text: Discover 2 Bystander cards. Remove 1 Bystander card from the game. Destroy 1 Bystander card. Each Hero target deals itself 2 fixed psychic damage.
Flavor Text: What's it going to be? Will you save the odious, corrupt politician, or try to make it all the way across town?

Title: Too Many Potential Victims
Game Text: Shuffle the Villain trash into the Villain deck. Discover 3 Bystander cards. Discover 1 Ongoing card. Add 1 token to Spite's character card.
Flavor Text: There's just too much. One man? Impossible. This is the work of a monster.

Title: Blast a Big Enough Hole
Game Text: If there are ever at least (H) minus 1 tokens on this card, destroy this card. During each turn's END PHASE, if 5 or more damage was dealt to Terrorform that turn, add 1 token to this card.
Flavor Text: I know, Dad. Careful not to overdo it and all that. But sometimes, you just gotta let loose!

Title: Climb Along the Outside
Game Text: If there are ever at least (H) minus 1 tokens on this card, destroy this card. On each Hero's turn, that Hero may skip their DRAW PHASE. After a Hero does so, add 1 token to this card.
Flavor Text: Ha-ha! Vroom! Heh-- aw heck, my radio is still on, isn't it?

Title: Gum Up the Works
Game Text: If there are ever at least (H) minus 1 tokens on this card, destroy this card. END PHASE Each Hero may bury 1 card from their trash. Each time an Item or Ongoing card is buried this way, add 1 token to this card.
Flavor Text: One more pass... Suffering succotash, I'm gonna need a massage after this!

Title: Hack the Mainframe
Game Text: If there are ever at least (H) minus 1 tokens on this card, destroy this card. Each Hero gains this power: POWER: Discard the top card of the Villain deck. If a Minion card was discarded this way, play it. Add 1 token to this card.
Flavor Text: Their network security is a lot more sophisticated than I'd expect. Not sure who we're dealing with here, but they're no slouch.

Title: Just Get Lucky
Game Text: If there are ever at least (H) minus 1 tokens on this card, destroy this card. END PHASE 1 Hero discards any number of cards and draws 1 card. Then, if that Hero has no One-Shot cards in hand, add 2 tokens to this card.
Flavor Text: Oh! It just opened for me? Huh, this thing must think I'm someone with access! Weird glitch.

Title: Locate a Weak Spot
Game Text: If there are ever at least (H) minus 1 tokens on this card, destroy this card. Each Hero gains this power: POWER: Discard the top 3 cards of the Villain deck. Add 1 token to this card for each Device card discarded this way.
Flavor Text: The resonance of all creation sings to a rhythm, and that rhythm falters... here.
Attribution: The Argent Adept, Virtuoso of the Void Vol. 2 #88

Title: Lower Cranial Aperture Laser
Game Text: END PHASE Terrorform deals the non-Villain target with the highest HP (H) energy damage. Then, if Terrorform has 100 or more HP, Terrorform deals each non-Villain target 1 energy damage.
Flavor Text: Too much... power! This clanker isn't going to have any trouble with us unless we can get inside and do some damage!

Title: Neuro-Toxin Emitters
Game Text: END PHASE Terrorform deals each non-Villain target 1 toxic damage. Then, if Terrorform has 100 or more HP, destroy 1 Hero Ongoing card.
Flavor Text: Ope, it's putting out the gas again! Button up, everyone. Breathe through your ears if you can.
Attribution: The Scholar, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 3 #194

Title: Revoker Gravity Lashers
Game Text: -1 damage dealt to this card. END PHASE This card deals the 2 Hero targets with the highest HP 2 psychic damage each.
Flavor Text: Beware their whips of light and terror! If they touch you, the ground shall be your fate!

Title: Revoker Mag-Rollers
Game Text: -1 damage dealt to this card. END PHASE This card deals each Hero target 1 lightning damage.
Flavor Text: There is nothing of nature here. They will pollute and despoil, and we are all that can stop them.
Attribution: The Naturalist, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 3 #197

Title: Revoker Nano-Mechanics
Game Text: -1 damage dealt to this card. END PHASE Each Device card regains (H) HP.
Flavor Text: We keep tearing pieces of this thing off... and they keep putting them back on! More frustrating than fun!

Title: Revoker Wall Walkers
Game Text: -1 damage dealt to this card. END PHASE This card deals the Hero target with the highest HP 3 cold damage.
Flavor Text: Winter's chill... from a man-made device? The horrors of humanity have gone too far.
Attribution: Akash'Thriya, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 3 #195

Title: Seismic Resonators
Game Text: END PHASE Terrorform deals each non-Villain target 1 sonic damage. Then, if Terrorform has 100 or more HP, destroy 1 Item card.
Flavor Text: The land is torn by these tremors-- I cannot hope to withstand what so easily rends the earth!
Attribution: Akash'Thriya, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 3 #196

Title: Send Everyone!
Game Text: Shuffle the Villain trash into the Villain deck. Discover 1 Device card, 1 Minion card, and 1 Access card.
Flavor Text: We've just got word. Deploy more units. Our work isn't complete until we clear at least an entire city block.

Title: Steal Keycards from Foes
Game Text: If there are ever at least (H) minus 1 tokens on this card, destroy this card. After a Minion card is dealt damage by a Hero target, add 1 token to this card.
Flavor Text: These Revokers wear their keycards on a belt clip! Revokers? More like access granters! ...I've been hanging out with Unity too much.

Title: Troop Egress Hatches
Game Text: END PHASE Discover (H) minus 2 Minion cards. Then, if Terrorform has 100 or more HP, discover 1 Device card.
Flavor Text: They are like ants! Because they are small. And also they bug me! Because bug is a thing that ants are!

Title: Bloated Businesstoad
Game Text: END PHASE: This card deals the non-Nightmare target with the highest HP 3 energy damage. If there are no Environment cards in play, play the top card of the Environment deck.
Flavor Text: Alright, alright -- can we make some kind of deal here? One that involves you not breaking anything else?

Title: Clattering Specter
Game Text: END PHASE: This card deals the 4 non-Nightmare targets with the highest HP 1 infernal damage each. Then, this card regains 1 HP.
Flavor Text: I would say that they're not real, but that gets into discussions of what ***real*** means, and… no thanks.

Title: Dark Hero
Game Text: +1 damage dealt by Nightmare cards other than this one.  END PHASE: This card deals the non-Nightmare target with the highest HP 2 melee damage.
Flavor Text: Truth, justice, freedom -- pathetic ideals for a pathetic man.
Attribution: Dark Hero, America's Finest Legacy Vol. 1 #224

Title: Granite Oni
Game Text: END PHASE: This card deals the non-Nightmare target with the lowest HP 2 melee damage. Then, this card regains 2 HP.
Flavor Text: True stone can crush bones. False stone can crush minds.

Title: Night Terrors
Game Text: If there are fewer than (H) Nightmare cards in play, discover 1 Nightmare card. The Villain target with the highest HP deals the Hero target with the highest HP X psychic damage, where X is the number of Nightmare cards in play.
Flavor Text: There's something downstairs, but she won't wake up. We need to get ourselves and our daughter out of this house while we still can!

Title: Outer Demons
Game Text: Shuffle the Villain trash into the Villain deck. Discover 1 Nightmare card. The Dreamer deals each non-Villain target 2 psychic damage.
Flavor Text: …No. No! I don't want to hurt anyone! I just can't… wake up…

Title: Projected Paralysis
Game Text: After a Hero uses a power, their Hero character deals themself 3 fixed energy damage.  START PHASE: Destroy this card.
Flavor Text: I cannot… move… at all! She's just a little girl, but her mind is mighty, indeed!

Title: Skittering Arachnoid
Game Text: END PHASE: This card deals the 2 non-Nightmare cards with the highest HP 2 toxic damage each. Destroy the Environment target with the lowest HP.
Flavor Text: The creatures of this world are quite unlike the ones of my own… but these seem particularly out of place!

Title: Tend to the Child
Game Text: After this card is played, 1 Hero may discard 1 card. If they do, The Dreamer regains 3 HP.  START PHASE: Discover (H) minus 2 Nightmare cards. Destroy this card.
Flavor Text: I had hoped it would not come to this for you, child. It seems our fates are more closely aligned, unfortunately.

Title: Tooth Fairy
Game Text: END PHASE: The Hero with the most cards in hand discards 1 card. Then, this card deals each Hero target belonging to the Hero with the fewest cards in hand 2 toxic damage.
Flavor Text: You're no real fairy. No creature of the Fey at all. But you do have a powerful hunger for teeth, and that's a problem.

Title: The Toy Master
Game Text: END PHASE: Destroy 1 Hero Ongoing or Item card. Then, this card deals each Hero target in the Hero play area with the most Ongoing and/or Item cards 2 toxic damage.
Flavor Text: Stop saying that! This is not all fun, and this is also not all games. This is neither of those two things!

Title: The Treacherous Ape
Game Text: END PHASE: 1 Hero discards 1 card. Destroy 1 Hero Ongoing or Item card. Each Nightmare card regains 1 HP.
Flavor Text: You look just like a toy that the Vanessa Long of this reality holds dear. Albeit, much larger.
Attribution: The Visionary, Mind Over Matter Vol. 1 #32

Title: Violent Nightmares
Game Text: Discover 1 Nightmare card. Destroy 1 Environment card. Destroy 1 Hero Ongoing card. Destroy 1 Item card.
Flavor Text: This event must be contained. The people of this town are in danger now, but there's no telling how far this may spread.

Title: Whipacorn
Game Text: END PHASE: This card deals the target other than itself with the highest HP 3 melee damage. If a Hero character is dealt damage this way, destroy 1 Item card in that Hero's play area.
Flavor Text: It's been a weird day, but I still can't believe I'm saying this: I think I'm going to have to kill that unicorn.
Attribution: Alpha, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 3 #29

Title: Ancient Magicks
Game Text: Activate all ANKH effects. If Isis is active, Isis deals each non-Villain target 2 energy damage. Otherwise, the Villain character with the lowest HP deals each Hero character 1 infernal damage.
Flavor Text: What have you done to me, vile witch of the desert? Return to me my staff, and I shall be mercifully swift in your destruction.

Title: The Ankh of Nephthys
Game Text: After this card is played, summon Nephthys from under The Ennead character card. Then, activate the ANKH effect on Nephthys's character card. -1 damage dealt to Nephthys.
Flavor Text: I have read of such relics with power over life and death, but always at a cost. If you have found such a thing, tread carefully.

Title: Blast of Flame
Game Text: Activate all SUN effects. If Atum is active, Atum deals the (H) minus 1 non-Villain targets with the highest HP 3 fire damage each. Otherwise, the Villain character with the highest HP deals the non-Villain target with the highest HP 2 fire damage.
Flavor Text: An entire city, just wiped off the face of the map. Burned off, really.
Attribution: Marty Adams, Ra: God of the Sun Vol. 1 #273

Title: The Bracer of Atum
Game Text: After this card is played, summon Atum from under The Ennead character card. Then, activate the SUN effect on Atum's character card. +1 damage dealt by Atum.
Flavor Text: It's no coincidence that I control flame as you do. I am the superior sun god, after all.

Title: The Crook and Flail of Osiris
Game Text: After this card is played, summon Osiris from under The Ennead character card. Then, activate the HAND effect on Osiris's character card. +1 damage dealt by Osiris. -1 damage dealt to Osiris.
Flavor Text: I am called to be a shepherd, directing lost souls to their eternal resting place. Are you ready to join them?

Title: Defender of the Waters
Game Text: Activate all SUN effects. If Tefnut is active, destroy 1 Ongoing card in each non-Villain play area. Otherwise, the Villain character with the lowest HP deals the non-Villain target with the highest HP 2 melee damage.
Flavor Text: The Nile grants us life and shelters that life from those who would bring it harm. Our foes will wash out with the current.
Attribution: Tefnut, Ra: God of the Sun Vol. 1 #274

Title: Desert's Wrath
Game Text: Activate all HAND effects. If Geb is active, Geb deals the Hero target with the highest HP X melee damage, where X is the number of Environment cards in play. Otherwise, the Villain character with the highest HP deals the Hero target with the highest HP 2 melee damage.
Flavor Text: Every grain of sand is mine! See how they obey my will!

Title: Elemental Storm
Game Text: Activate all ANKH effects. If Set is active, each Hero draws 1 card, then play the top card of the Villain deck. Otherwise, the Villain character with the lowest HP deals the Hero target with the highest HP 1 cold damage and 1 lightning damage.
Flavor Text: I bring you the elements in their truest unleashed form! Back in all of their resplendent glory!

Title: Grasp of Life and Death
Game Text: Activate all ANKH effects. If Nephthys is active, destroy (H) minus 2 Hero Ongoing and/or Item cards, then shuffle the Villain trash into the Villain deck. Otherwise, each Villain character regains 2 HP.
Flavor Text: The dance of existence is a careful one. A simple misstep can so easily upend an entire generation.

Title: The Grave Beckons
Game Text: Activate all HAND effects. If Osiris is active, Osiris deals the non-Villain target with the lowest HP (H) energy damage. Otherwise, the (H) non-Villain targets with the lowest HP deals themself 1 fixed psychic damage each.
Flavor Text: His very presence is death. The dead are his people, but all the living must fear him.
Attribution: Ra, Ra: God of the Sun Vol. 1 #274

Title: The Khopesh of Shu
Game Text: After this card is played, summon Shu from under The Ennead character card. Then, activate the HAND effect on Shu's character card. Shu is immune to melee and projectile damage.
Flavor Text: The silent blade. It cuts as the wind blows; uncaring, unending, unstoppable.

Title: The Orb of Nuit
Game Text: After this card is played, summon Nuit from under The Ennead character card. Then, activate the SUN effect on Nuit's character card. -1 damage dealt to Villain characters other than Nuit.
Flavor Text: Peace, people of the ground and of the river. Rise not against us, your true gods. Find acceptance in your subservience.

Title: The Shield of Tefnut
Game Text: After this card is played, summon Tefnut from under The Ennead character card. Then, activate the SUN effect on Tefnut's character card. -2 damage dealt to Tefnut.
Flavor Text: They put up an admirable fight, especially that cat-like one with the impressive shield. I would trade blows with her again!

Title: The Sickle of Geb
Game Text: After this card is played, summon Geb from under The Ennead character card. Then, activate the HAND effect on Geb's character card. Damage dealt by Geb is irreducible.
Flavor Text: He need not wield the sickle to utilize its powers, but his attachment to it may be a weakness.
Attribution: The Argent Adept, War of Heliopolis #3

Title: Stolen Breath
Game Text: Activate all HAND effects. If Shu is active, each non-Villain target deals itself 2 fixed energy damage. Otherwise, the Villain character with the lowest HP deals the Hero character with the second lowest HP (H) minus 1 infernal damage.
Flavor Text: Ack -- You whispy blaggard. \*cough\* Hardly a sporting move, now is it?

Title: The Sun Disc of Isis
Game Text: After this card is played, summon Isis from under The Ennead character card. Then, activate the ANKH effect on Isis's character card. Damage dealt by Isis is irreducible.
Flavor Text: Your ***modern*** magicks are no match for true, ancient might. Behold -- arcane perfection!
Attribution: Isis, Ra: God of the Sun Vol. 1 #272

Title: Taste of Immortality
Game Text: Activate all SUN effects. If Nuit is active, the Villain character with the lowest HP regains (H) HP. Otherwise, each Villain character regains 1 HP and shuffle the Villain trash into the Villain deck.
Flavor Text: She is not of the heavens -- she is heaven itself.

Title: The Typhonic Rod of Set
Game Text: After this card is played, summon Set from under The Ennead character card. Then, activate the ANKH effect on Set's character card. +1 damage dealt by Set.
Flavor Text: Your staff may be more than it appears, imbued with power enough to block Absolution, but it shall not save you from retribution!

Title: Champion Lugh
Game Text: After a Villain target is destroyed, add 1 token to 1 Villain character card. END PHASE This card deals the Hero target with the highest HP 3 melee damage. That target may deal 1 target 1 melee damage.
Flavor Text: To fight and strive and win against all odds! A challenge meant to honor fey and gods!

Title: A Chance for Love
Game Text: Play this card in a Hero play area. START PHASE 1 Hero plays 1 Ongoing card. END PHASE If this is the play area with the most Ongoing cards in play, destroy 1 Ongoing card in each play area, then remove 1 token from 1 Villain character card and bury this card.
Flavor Text: To you, oh child of void, I grant a chance, to learn if what you feel is circumstance.
Attribution: Ogma, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 3 #215

Title: The Court's Displeasure
Game Text: Whenever a Villain character card is dealt damage by a Hero target, remove 2 tokens from that Villain character card. END PHASE The Villain target with the highest HP deals the (H) minus 2 Hero targets with the highest HP 2 infernal damage each.
Flavor Text: You would besmirch the honor of my court! You lie! You'll rot! We'll excise you, vile wart!

Title: Dryad Chancellors
Game Text: END PHASE Reveal the top card of the Villain deck. If it is a One-Shot card, discard it and add 1 token to 1 Villain character card. Otherwise, play it.
Flavor Text: You have to listen to us! Ugh, OK, hold on... umm... Give us your ears, oh favored of the fey. We really need your help... Please help... today?

Title: Elder Ogma
Game Text: After a Bond card is buried, add 1 token to 1 Villain character card. END PHASE Reveal the top 3 cards of the Villain deck. Bury 1 and replace the other 2 in any order.
Flavor Text: The truth of riches vast and fortunes long, shall be laid bare before the Fey-Court's throng.

Title: A Glimpse at the Future
Game Text: Play this card in a Hero play area. START PHASE Reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Discard 1 and play 1. Then, put the top card of the Villain deck under this card. END PHASE If there are 3 or more cards under this card, play all of them, then remove 1 token from 1 Villain character card and bury this card.
Flavor Text: That's you! You see? You venture far and wide! The space without reveals your heart inside!

Title: The Grand Revel
Game Text: Each Villain target regains 2 HP. Each Hero target deals itself 1 toxic damage. Remove 1 token from each Villain character card. [flip] each Villain character card.
Flavor Text: Come now, all ye who in the fey-realm be! Drink up! Accept our hospitality!

Title: A Modicum of Knowledge
Game Text: Play this card in a Hero play area. START PHASE Draw 2 to 4 cards. END PHASE If you have 9 or more cards in hand, 1 Hero character deals themself 9 fixed psychic damage, then remove 1 token from 1 Villain character card and bury this card.
Flavor Text: I want to be the powerful mage that she claims I can be, but there has to be an easier way to learn everything I need to know!

Title: Nymph Stewards
Game Text: END PHASE 1 Hero with no Bond cards in their play area discards 1 card. If no card is discarded this way, remove 1 token from each Villain character card.
Flavor Text: The finest of attendants treat us well. You doubt the intent of my personnel?

Title: An Offer of Prosperity
Game Text: Play this card in a Hero play area. START PHASE Play 1 card. Each Hero draws 1 card. END PHASE If any Hero has more cards in hand than you do, discard your hand and draw 1 card, then remove 1 token from 1 Villain character card and bury this card.
Flavor Text: You should be proud of your fighting spirit! Let our battle rage, for all to hear it!

Title: Pixie Knights
Game Text: END PHASE This card deals the Hero target with the highest HP (H) melee damage. If that damage is reduced, prevented, or redirected, remove 1 token from 1 Villain character card.
Flavor Text: To me, my knights! We ride this day at dawn! Sing forth to battle; war, our lexicon!
Attribution: The Morrigan, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 4 #25

Title: Salamander Arbiters
Game Text: END PHASE This card deals each Hero target in play areas with more than 1 Bond card 3 fire damage. If no damage is dealt this way, remove 1 token from each Villain character card.
Flavor Text: Now we're talking! All of this hoity-toity stuff was getting on my nerves, but I'll take a fire-breathing lizard-man any day!

Title: Seasons Change
Game Text: Shuffle the Villain trash into the Villain deck. Discover 1 Advisor card. [flip] the Villain character card with the most tokens on it. Remove 1 token from each Villain character card.
Flavor Text: This court to you gave warmth and life and peace. Now here you stand, demanding your release?

Title: A Taste of Power
Game Text: Play this card in a Hero play area. START PHASE 1 Hero target in this play area deals 1 target 3 melee damage. END PHASE If 7 or more damage was dealt this turn, 1 target in this play area deals each target 2 radiant damage, then remove 1 token from 1 Villain character card and bury this card.
Flavor Text: I've learned a lot from this curse. Time for you to get a taste of it, too!

Title: A Time of Peace
Game Text: Play this card in a Hero play area. START PHASE Discard 1 card. Each target regains 2 HP. END PHASE If any targets were destroyed this turn, play the top card of the Villain deck, then remove 1 token from 1 Villain character card and bury this card.
Flavor Text: Truth be told, it's all I've ever known. I fight to save people. But I'm tired. Can I bring peace to the world-- without violence?

Title: Trickster Puck
Game Text: After a Villain character card flips, add 1 token to 1 Villain character card. END PHASE 1 Hero discards 2 cards and draws 1 card. Then, if no Villain character cards flipped this turn, play the top card of the Villain deck.
Flavor Text: A gift! Forsooth, you ask so much of me? But surely, first, join in the revelry...

Title: Will O'Wisp Heralds
Game Text: END PHASE This card deals each Hero target 2 sonic damage. Add 1 token to 1 Villain character card. Each Hero with a Bond card in their play area may draw 1 card.
Flavor Text: These are the wisps that announce the will of the Fey-Court rulers. To find them here is an ominous portent.
Attribution: NightMist, Virtuoso of the Void Vol. 2 #38

Title: Building of Rooks
Game Text: After this card is played, play the top card of the villain deck. END PHASE This card deals the Hero target with the highest HP 2 projectile damage.
Flavor Text: Feel the fury of the skies, scorned!
Attribution: The Matriarch, Night's Plutonian Shore One-Shot

Title: Carrion Fields
Game Text: START PHASE Unless both Huginn and Muninn are in play, discover 1 Cohort card. If a Cohort card is played this way, destroy this card. END PHASE Each Cohort card deals each Hero target 1 toxic damage.
Flavor Text: When you all asked for help, I figured you wanted me to freezer burn a bunch of birds. Not my fault it turned out worse.
Attribution: Absolute Zero, Night's Plutonian Shore One-Shot

Title: Clattering of Jackdaws
Game Text: After this card is played, play the top card of the villain deck. END PHASE This card deals each Hero target 1 projectile damage.
Flavor Text: A most pestilent congregation of horrid, flighty creatures.
Attribution: The Matriarch, Night's Plutonian Shore One-Shot

Title: Darken the Sky
Game Text: Summon the Mask of the Matriarch. Shuffle all of the Fowl cards in the Villain trash into the Villain deck. The Matriarch deals the Hero target with the highest HP (H) psychic damage.
Flavor Text: The fowl rise! To o'erwhelm all the Earth! And pluck out men's eyes!

Title: Horrid Cacophony
Game Text: The Matriarch deals the (H) minus 1 Hero targets with the highest HP 2 sonic damage each. Destroy (H) minus 2 Hero Ongoing and/or Item cards.
Flavor Text: They're just simple birds! They shouldn't be able to reach such dangerous decibel levels!

Title: Huginn
Game Text: -1 damage dealt to The Matriarch and Cohort cards. After any Fowl card is played, this card deals the Hero target with the second highest HP 1 psychic damage.
Flavor Text: So subtle, your thoughts run as dark as your pinions. Together, we shall gather the bright and shiny objects of this world.
Attribution: The Matriarch, Night's Plutonian Shore One-Shot

Title: Kettle of Vultures
Game Text: After this card is played, play the top card of the villain deck. END PHASE This card deals the Hero target with the lowest HP 2 projectile damage.
Flavor Text: There is no path which the vulture's eye hath not seen...
Attribution: The Matriarch, Night's Plutonian Shore One-Shot

Title: Mask of the Matriarch
Game Text: Damage dealt by Fowl cards is irreducible. After a non-Fowl Villain card other than this card is played for the first time each turn, play the top card of the Villain deck.
Flavor Text: Thus, I am the Matriarch! From the center to the sea, I rule as queen of the fowl!

Title: Muninn
Game Text: +1 damage dealt by The Matriarch and Cohort cards. After any Fowl card is destroyed, this card deals the Hero target with the highest HP 1 projectile damage.
Flavor Text: Oh wicked friend. Your beak rips and your talons tear. A simple creature, you crave only conquest.
Attribution: The Matriarch, Night's Plutonian Shore One-Shot

Title: Murder of Crows
Game Text: After this card is played, play the top card of the villain deck. END PHASE This card deals each Hero target except the Hero target with the highest HP 1 projectile damage.
Flavor Text: Fowl of the air! Rain down on all who creepeth upon the earth!

Title: Unkindness of Ravens
Game Text: After this card is played, play the top card of the villain deck. END PHASE This card deals each Hero target except the Hero target with the lowest HP 1 projectile damage.
Flavor Text: The ravens themselves are hoarse, croaking thy fatal exit!

Title: The Broker
Game Text: COMMANDS Discover 1 Informant. Then, discard the top card of each Hero deck. Whenever an Ongoing card is discarded this way, each Villain target regains 1 HP. END PHASE Activate ORDERS on each Informant.
Flavor Text: Knowing is the half of it. The other half is profit.
Attribution: The Broker, Built in a Day #2

Title: The Contract
Game Text: COMMANDS Discover 1 Hitman. Then, this card deals the Hero target with the lowest HP 2 projectile damage. END PHASE Activate ORDERS on each Hitman.
Flavor Text: It's nothing personal, you understand -- just business.
Attribution: The Contract, Built in a Day #4

Title: Crooked Cop
Game Text: -1 damage dealt to Underboss cards. ORDERS Randomly play 1 card from under The Chairman's character card.
Flavor Text: Heh, I doubt you'll get the help you're looking for from local law enforcement.

Title: The Deputy
Game Text: COMMANDS Discover 1 Crooked Cop. Then, each Thug card regains 2 HP. END PHASE Activate ORDERS on each Crooked Cop.
Flavor Text: I, too, enforce the rules. My boss just pays better.
Attribution: The Deputy, Built in a Day #2

Title: Enforcer
Game Text: -1 damage dealt to Thug cards. ORDERS This card deals the Hero target with the second lowest HP (H) minus 2 melee damage.
Flavor Text: Threats? Intimidation? Nothing of the sort! You clearly need protection, and who better to provide it than these fine, strapping lads!
Attribution: The Muscle, Built in a Day #1

Title: The Fence
Game Text: COMMANDS Discover 1 Thief. Then, bury the Villain trash. END PHASE Activate ORDERS on each Thief.
Flavor Text: Imagine, a piece this fine caged away in some exhibit? An affront to true art. Instead, I help it find its purpose with the art of commerce.
Attribution: The Fence, Built in a Day #3

Title: Hitman
Game Text: After the first time an Environment card is played each turn, this card deals each Hero target 2 projectile damage. ORDERS This card deals the Hero target with the highest HP 3 projectile damage.
Flavor Text: Two targets, both unarmed. Easy in, but tricky out if you get seen. Don't get seen. No muss, no fuss. You know the score.
Attribution: The Contract, Built in a Day #3

Title: Informant
Game Text: After the first time an Environment card is played each turn, 1 Hero discards 1 card. ORDERS (H) minus 1 Heroes each discard 1 card.
Flavor Text: One man's mistake is another man's opportunity.

Title: The Muscle
Game Text: COMMANDS Discover 1 Enforcer. Then, this card deals the Hero target with the highest HP 3 melee damage. END PHASE Activate ORDERS on each Enforcer.
Flavor Text: Well, well, well -- what do we have here? Buncha big strong blokes playing at dress-up? Fancy a spot of ruckus?
Attribution: The Muscle, Built in a Day #4

Title: New Assignments
Game Text: Randomly play 1 card from under The Chairman's character card. Then, if there are no cards under The Chairman's character card, activate COMMANDS on the Underboss card with the highest HP.
Flavor Text: There's always someone willing to take the Organization's offer. If someone gonna be stepped on, better to be the one doing the stepping.

Title: Perfect Human Specimens
Game Text: The Chairman regains (H) HP. The Operative regains (H) HP. Activate COMMANDS on The Operative's character card.
Flavor Text: Testing? Hardly. I wouldn't risk my most trusted agent in such a way. This gift is tried and true.

Title: Prison Break
Game Text: Shuffle The Chairman's trash into The Chairman's deck. Discover 1 Underboss card. If no cards are played this way, randomly play 1 card from under The Chairman's character card.
Flavor Text: Oddly, there were no officers on duty at the time.
Attribution: The Deputy, Built in a Day #5

Title: Rook City is Mine!
Game Text: Play the top card of the Environment deck. Activate COMMANDS on The Operative's character card.
Flavor Text: I built this city. Challenge me here and you will discover that I am not only a creator...

Title: Thief
Game Text: After the first time an Environment card is played each turn, destroy 1 Hero Ongoing or Item card. ORDERS Destroy 1 Hero Ongoing or Item card.
Flavor Text: Ah, Rook City, where even your shoes would walk away if they weren't tied on.

Title: Top Level Directives
Game Text: Activate COMMANDS on The Operative's character card. If The Operative is incapacitated, The Chairman deals the Hero target with the highest HP 3 melee damage.
Flavor Text: We've been laying low long enough. Time to remind them who really runs things around here.
Attribution: The Chairman, Built in a Day #6

Title: Blade and Battery
Game Text: The Operative deals the Hero target with the highest HP 4 melee damage. If The Muscle is in play, activate the COMMANDS on his card.
Flavor Text: Enough chatter. The time to strike is now.

Title: Hidden Blade
Game Text: After this card is played, destroy all other Technique cards. After The Operative is dealt damage by a non-Villain target, she deals the attacker 2 melee damage. END PHASE The Operative deals the Hero target with the lowest HP 3 melee damage.
Flavor Text: Your opponent hears everything your sword says. A knife is much harder to listen to.

Title: Insider Info
Game Text: Destroy 1 Hero Ongoing or Item card. If The Broker is in play, activate the COMMANDS on her card.
Flavor Text: What is information, if not a weapon? Give me something I can wield.

Title: Lethal Foe
Game Text: The Operative deals the Hero target with the highest HP (H) melee damage. Then, if that target has 4 or fewer HP, destroy that target.
Flavor Text: And we can't have that, now can we?

Title: Mark for Execution
Game Text: The Operative deals the 3 Hero targets with the highest HP 2 projectile damage each. If The Contract is in play, activate the COMMANDS on his card.
Flavor Text: I've marked your target. You'll know him when you see him. Don't fail me again.

Title: Play the System
Game Text: The Operative and each Underboss card regain (H) HP each. If The Deputy is in play, activate the COMMANDS on his card.
Flavor Text: You continue to have a position so long as you're useful to the Chairman. Your leadership goes only as far as he allows it.

Title: Show of Force
Game Text: Discover (H) Thug cards from The Chairman's deck.
Flavor Text: The chain of command is mine to wield! You will do as ordered.

Title: Skimming Strikes
Game Text: After this card is played, destroy all other Technique cards. Damage dealt by The Operative is irreducible. END PHASE The Operative deals each Hero target 2 melee damage.
Flavor Text: You lack focus. You cannot always be the whirlwind. Eventually, you must decide for yourself.

Title: Take from the Weak
Game Text: The Operative deals the Hero target with the lowest HP 3 melee damage. If The Fence is in play, activate the COMMANDS on his card.
Flavor Text: Profits over people. Resources are there to be used, even human resources.

Title: Undivided Attention
Game Text: After this card is played, destroy all other Technique cards. Whenever The Operative deals damage, redirect that damage to the Hero target with the highest HP. END PHASE The Operative deals the Hero target with the highest HP (H) plus 1 melee damage.
Flavor Text: It appears you may be worth our time after all, Mr. Walker. Very well.

Title: Abbados the Wrathful
Game Text: END PHASE: This card deals the (H) targets other than itself with the highest HP 2 melee damage each. Æ:  START PHASE: This card deals the target with the highest HP other than itself (H) melee damage. This card deals each target other than itself 1 infernal damage.
Flavor Text: The forces of Ætenrus hunger for war! The mortal realm is as dust before us!

Title: An Age of Torment
Game Text: +1 damage dealt by Demon cards. After a Hero uses a power, the Hero target with the highest HP deals themself 1 fixed psychic damage.  START PHASE: Each Hero may destroy any number of their Item and/or Ongoing cards. If at least (H) cards are destroyed this way, destroy this card.
Flavor Text: Time is without meaning -- all is suffering without end! Abandon hope and embrace the truth!

Title: Æternal Conflict
Game Text: The Villain target with the highest HP deals the (H) targets other than itself with the lowest HP 2 fire damage each. The Villain target with the lowest HP deals each Prince card other than itself 2 infernal damage.
Flavor Text: They squable and they fight -- the torment of this realm is for all, not merely the other worlds they assault.

Title: Belagorr the Slothful
Game Text: END PHASE: This card deals the target other than itself with the highest HP 1 psychic damage. This card regains (H) HP. Æ:  START PHASE: Each Hero character card deals itself 1 fixed energy damage. The Hero with the most cards in hand discards 2 cards and draws 1 card.
Flavor Text: All this fighting and struggle hardly seems worth it. We're all gonna get what's coming one way or another. I say just let it happen.

Title: Burden of the Crown
Game Text: Each Demon card regains 2 HP. The Ruler of Æternus deals itself X fixed psychic damage, where X is the number of other Demon cards in play. If no damage was dealt this way, play the top card of the Villain deck.
Flavor Text: All who vie for the Throne of Æternus only further the torment felt in this realm and beyond.

Title: Greezigrax the Gluttonous
Game Text: END PHASE: Discard the top card of the Villain deck. If a target was discarded this way, this card regains (H) HP. Otherwise, this card deals the (H) targets other than itself with the highest HP 1 sonic damage each. :ae:effect: +1 damage dealt by this card.
Flavor Text: I would ***never*** take from our true ruler. I merely hold the throne until Æternus returns…

Title: Ismodial the Lusty
Game Text: END PHASE: Discover 1 non-Prince Demon card. This card regains X HP, where X is the number of non-Prince Demon cards in play. Æ: -1 damage dealt to non-Prince Demon targets.
Flavor Text: Everybody ***wants*** something. Tell me what ***you*** want. I can be your everything.

Title: Lusithar the Proud
Game Text: END PHASE: This card deals each target other than itself 2 radiant damage. Æ:  START PHASE: This card deals the (H) minus 2 targets other than itself with the highest HP 3 infernal damage each.
Flavor Text: You may look upon me -- I grant you that much. But do so at your own peril…

Title: Mannock the Greedy
Game Text: END PHASE: Destroy 1 Hero Ongoing or Item card. Each target other than this card deals itself 1 fixed psychic damage. Æ: After a Hero Ongoing or Item card is destroyed, this card regains 2 HP.
Flavor Text: Mine! Mine mine mine! None is yours -- all is mine!

Title: Mosqueetle Legionnaire
Game Text: -1 damage dealt to this card.  END PHASE: This card deals the Hero target with the highest HP 2 irreducible melee damage. Æ:  START PHASE: This card regains (H) HP and deals the Hero target with the highest HP (H) infernal damage.
Flavor Text: Ah! The dreaded demon beetle ug soldiers! I have only read about these in dark texts, but they are far more terrifying in person!

Title: Obsequious Impling
Game Text: This card is immune to damage dealt by Prince cards. +1 damage dealt by Prince cards. Æ:  START PHASE: This card deals the non-Prince target with the highest HP 1 infernal damage. If damage is dealt to a Hero target this way, play the top card of the Villain deck.
Flavor Text: Oh, we can trust you? You won't give away our secrets? We should spare you? …I think not.

Title: Pandemonium
Game Text: Bury the Villain trash. Discover (H) minus 2 Demon cards. Destroy (H) minus 2 Hero Ongoing and/or Item cards. Play the top card of the Environment deck.
Flavor Text: An incursion into ***my*** realm? How… ambitious. We shall see if the Legions of Torment can experience ***Gloom***…

Title: Regime Change
Game Text: Bury the Villain trash. Discover 1 Prince card. If there are 2 or more Villain Prince cards in play, destroy the Villain Prince card with the lowest HP.
Flavor Text: I have no patience for your so-called politics. Votes be damned -- the throne is mine!

Title: Scabrous Filthscrabbler
Game Text: END PHASE: This card deals the Hero target with the highest HP (H) minus 2 toxic damage. Æ:  START PHASE: This card deals the target with the highest HP (H) plus 2 infernal damage.
Flavor Text: Never believe one word from their mouth -- all manner of filth comes outta there.
Attribution: Rambler, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 2 #327

Title: Seviathall the Envious
Game Text: END PHASE: This card deals each target with more HP than this card's current HP value 2 psychic damage. Æ:  START PHASE: Destroy 1 Hero Ongoing card in the Hero play area of the Hero with the most cards in hand. That Hero draws 1 card.
Flavor Text: You've worked ***so*** hard and sacrificed ***so*** much. Why should others get all the rewards? Claim what should be yours!

Title: Slavering Festerhound
